La aspiración de Glenda es mejorar económicamente con la ayuda de los préstamos para superarse económicamente con su familia.
texts.en: Glenda is 21 years old and lives with her husband and their 7 month old baby in their own house.  For the last year, Glenda has worked raising chickens, a business she started with her husband to generate more income and allow her to work from their home.  Glenda is requesting a loan to purchase 200 chickens, as well as feed and medicine necessary to raise and sell the chickens and grow her business.  Her goal is to use the loans to earn more money and help improve her family's economic situation.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and sacks of chicken feed

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente, tiene 51 años de edad, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, quienes estudian y dependen de el, Vicente se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, trabaja todos los días en el mantenimiento de la granja.
El está solicitando un préstamo para comprarse cerdos y concentrado, esta compra le ayudara para incrementar la granja y obtener mejores ventas a futuro.
El aspira tener una granja más amplia y con más cerdos, tener también más clientes para mejorar la solvencia económica.
texts.en: Vincente is 51 years old and lives with his wife and their 2 children who attend school and depend on their father for support.  Vincente works raising pigs, a business he works every day to run and maintain.  He is requesting a loan to purchase more pigs as well as pig feed.  This will help him grow his business and increase sales in the future.  Vincente's goal is to have a larger farm with more pigs, and more customers, enabling him to earn more income.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and pig feed

loans.name: Mamadou Fall

texts.fr:
Monsieur Mamadou Fall, âgé de 43 ans, est un commerçant qui exerce le métier depuis 12 ans déjà. Il fait de la vente de produits alimentaires divers. Il se ravitaille dans un marché hebdomadaire ou les denrées sont à des prix abordables. Avec le crédit, il va acheter pour revendre du mil, du tamarin et divers autres produits.
Mamadou Fall est marié et père de 6 enfants dont le plus âgé a 17 ans et le cadet 4 ans. Il s’occupe des besoins familiaux. Le crédit va impacter sur  la situation du client car il va voir son stock augmenter. Comme projet futur : il veut acquérir un taxi pour diversifier son activité et  augmenter ses sources de revenu. Et ce projet, il désire le voir se réaliser avec l’appui des préteurs.
texts.en: Mamadou Fall, age 43, is a shopkeeper who has already been working for 12 years.  He sells various food products.  He gets his supplies in a weekly market where foodstuffs are reasonably priced.  He is going to buy millet, tamarind, and various other products to resell with his loan.  Fall is married and the father of 6 children.  The oldest child is 17 years old and the youngest is 4 years old.  He stays busy with family responsibilities.  The loan will have an impact on the client’s situation, as he will be able to increase his stock.  As a future project, he wants to purchase a taxi to diversify his business and increase his sources of revenue.  He hopes that this project will be completed with lenders' support.

loans.use: To purchase food products to resell (millet, tamarind, nététou [a seasoning])

loans.name: Jhon Carlos

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “VALLE SAGRADO A”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Jhon Carlos; el tiene 47 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, el socio tiene un carro que hace servicio de taxi, el socio trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño del socio es comprarse un carro nuevo. El  socio solicita el préstamo para mantenimiento de su carro para comprar llantas.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Introducing Jhon Carlos, a member of “VALLE SAGRADO A” (Sacred Valley A), a Communal Bank located in the Cusco district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Jhon Carlos is 47 years old, he lives with his life partner and has 3 children. He alternates his daily chores with his transportation activity, as he owns a car he offers taxi services with. He works from 7 am to 10 pm and thanks to this activity he is able to provide for his children. He dreams of buying himself a new car. The loan he is requesting will be used to pay for the maintenance of his car and to buy tires.

He is pleased with the loan and he commits to complying with the repayment of his dues.

loans.use: To pay for the maintenance of his car and to buy tires.

loans.name: Ligia Patricia

texts.es: Ligia es una mujer de 35 años y vive en el municipio de San Jacinto, en el departamento de Bolívar, la tierra de las hamacas y artesanías en tejido vertical;  allí se dedica a producir artesanías, oficio que además de conocer por tradición familiar, lo perfeccionó mediante procesos de tecnificación con el “SENA” Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje, organización que controla el estado nacional, para el desarrollo educativo de carreras técnicas y tecnológicas, por eso ella conoce no solo las artesanías de su cultura, sino también las de otras regiones del país. Así mismo como es una mujer estudiosa, también aprendió técnicas de mejoramiento de la imagen personal y tiene un salón de belleza; con ello abrió  una sala de juegos y  aprendió a preparara productos de belleza ella misma etc. Desde todos sus frentes activo-productivos, genera ingresos, aplicando técnicas de ventas en cada una de las actividades que sabe desempeñar, por eso se la pasa ganando clientes en uno y otro espacio productivo y su negocio crece cada día mas. Su meta de crecimiento es inagotable por eso se prepara con capacitaciones que le ayuden a agregarle valor a sus tareas rutinarias; su meta mas adelante es perfeccionarse como estilista de belleza y tener un gran negocio de producción y almacén de productos preparados por ella misma. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva,  segundo financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará hilo para elaborar bolsos, mochilas y hamacas, Juegos en CD, e insumos para preparar productos de belleza. Su inversión será exitosa, porque conoce el mercado, la hace sobre pedidos y conoce técnicas y las aplica a sus negocios, tiene un potencial de oferta permanente en cada una de sus actividades productivas con las cuales genera ingresos, para apoyar el bienestar de su hogar, conformado por su esposo y sus tres hijos en las edades de 4 a 12 años de edad.
texts.en: Ligia is a 35-year-old woman who lives in San Jacinto, Bolivar, land of hammocks and vertical weaving. There, she makes handicrafts for a living, something that she learned through family tradition but perfected via training from SENA (National Learning Service), which is an organization run by the state for the development of technical jobs. Because of this, she knows about handicrafts from not only her own culture, but also from other regions of the country. She is a very studious person who also learned about cosmetology and opened up a beauty salon. She also opened a game room and learned how to make beauty products herself. From all her proactive fronts, she is generating income, applying the sales techniques she knows how to employ in each of her businesses. For this reason, she has been gaining customers in all her ventures, and business grows ever day. Her goal of business expansion is endless, which is why she prepares herself with the training that helps her add value to her daily tasks. Her future goal is to perfect her stylist skills and to have a big beauty product business in which she will produce the goods herself. She is currently requesting her first loan through Kiva, and this is the second loan she requests from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With this loan, she will purchase thread to make bags, backpacks, and hammocks, video games, and supplies to make beauty products. Her investment will be successful because she knows the market well, she fills orders, she knows entrepreneurial techniques, and she applies them to her businesses. She is well-stocked in all of her businesses through which she earns an income to support her household, which is comprised of her husband and her children ages 4 and 12.

loans.use: to purchase video games, supplies to make beauty products, and thread to make bags, backpacks, and hammocks.

loans.name: Serafina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VALLE SAGRADO A”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Serafina; ella tiene 52 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende pantalones, blusas, chompas y polos, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar polos, blusas, chompas y pantalones al por mayor.

  La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Introducing Serafina, a member of “VALLE SAGRADO A” (Sacred Valley A), a Communal Bank located in the Cusco district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Serafina is 52 years old, she lives with her life partner and has 2 children. She alternates her daily chores with her retailing activity, selling items of clothing such has trousers, blouses, sweaters and polo shirts. She works from 7 am to 6 pm, and thanks to this activity she is able to provide for her children. Her aim is to expand her clothes selling activity. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy polo shirts, blouses, sweaters and trousers at wholesale price.

She is pleased with the loan and she commits to complying with the repayment of her dues.

loans.use: To buy polo shirts, blouses, sweaters and trousers at wholesale price.

loans.name: Rosa Judith

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VALLE SAGRADO A”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosa Judith; ella tiene 46 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, la socia prepara desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como carne, pollo y verduras.

  La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Introducing Rosa Judith, a member of “VALLE SAGRADO A” (Sacred Valley A), a Communal Bank located in the Cusco district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Rosa Judith is 46 years old, she is married and she has 3 children. She alternates her daily chores with her restaurant, preparing and serving breakfasts, lunches and dinners. She works from 8 am to 7 pm, and thanks to this activity she is able to provide for her children. Her aim is to improve her restaurant. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy coking ingredients such as meat, chicken and vegetables.

She is pleased with the loan and she commits to complying with the repayment of her dues.

loans.use: To buy coking ingredients such as meat, chicken and vegetables.

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VALLE SAGRADO A”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Guillermina; ella tiene 47 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para implementar la tienda de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, leche y galletas al por mayor.

  La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Introducing Guillermina, a member of “VALLE SAGRADO A” (Sacred Valley A), a Communal Bank located in the Cusco district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Guillermina is 47 years old, she is married and she has 2 children. She alternates her daily chores with her retailing activity running her general store. She sells basic necessities such as rice, sugar, milk and oil. She works from 7 am to 6 pm, and thanks to this activity she is able to provide for her children. Her aim is to expand her general store. The loan she is requesting will be used to stock up her general store by buying products such as rice, sugar, milk and biscuits at wholesale price.

She is pleased with the loan and she commits to complying with the repayment of her dues.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, milk and biscuits at wholesale price.

loans.name: Katia Vannesa

texts.es: Katia Vanessa, tiene la edad  de 25 años, está en unión libre,  vive con sus  hijos y su esposo que son su mayor prioridad. Ella con el crédito va comprar una motocicleta para que su esposo se desplazarse a su trabajo con menor dificultad. Ella quiere brindarle este medio de trasporte a su esposo pues el lugar donde labora es muy largo de su casa por lo cual debe salir muy de mañana y regresar muy tarde hasta su hogar. Ella también quiere que su esposo con la facilidad de trasporte sea más cumplido con su horario de trabajo pues es muy importante el trabajo para el bienestar de la familia pues es de donde subsiste la familia. Ella quiere que su esposo se desempeñe como un trabajador de muy buenas cualidades y  facilitar el apto del trasporte para ser mejores cada día y un mejor bienestar familiar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Katia Vanessa, 25, is in a common-law marriage and lives with her husband and their children, her first priority.  She will use the loan to buy a motorcycle for her husband so he can get to his work easily.  She wants to help him with  this means of transportation since the place where he works is very far from their house and he has to leave very early and come home very late.  She also wants to give him a more reliable means of transportation with his schedule because his work is what the family lives on.  She wants her husband to develop as a well qualified employee so she would like him to have the appropriate transportation so that their lives are better each day with the improvement of the welfare of the family.  This is the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR.  She hadn’t worked with other financing from state banks in the past but FUDECOSUR offered her the loan with the best terms and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for her husband's transportation to work

loans.name: Temur

texts.ru: Темур женат и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и добрый человек. На протяжении многих лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов и успешно продолжает до сегодняшнего дня, и в дальнейшем хочет расширить его. В основном он выращивает лук и пшеницу. В бизнесе помогает сын, дочь и супруга. Темур хотел бы получить займ в размере 2500 сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений и химикатов.
texts.en: Temur is married and has five children. He is a very hardworking and kind man. He has been growing agricultural crops for many years and is successfully continuing to this day and wants to expand it further. He grows mainly onions and wheat. His son, daughter and spouse are helping him in this business. Temur wants to get a loan in the amount of 2,500 somoni to buy mineral fertilizer and chemicals.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Sharofidin

texts.ru: Шарофидин добрый и честный человек. Он женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Более 7 лет он занимается выращиванием лука, бахчевых и зерновых культур. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Шарофиддин хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль. С этой целью он запрашивает займ для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений и кленки. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Sharofidin is a kind and honest man. He is married and is a responsible father of three children. He has been growing onions, melons and cereals for more than seven years. His wife is a homemaker. Sharofidin wants to expand his business so that he can get a good profit. He is asking for a loan with the purpose to buy seeds, mineral fertilizer and film. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is married. She has no children yet. She describes herself as honest. She works in a clothing business whereby she makes clothes and sells them. She faces the business challenge of fluctuating prices of clothing materials.

She will be using the loan of KES 20,000 to buy more clothing material for her business. Her dream and hope within the next five years is to run a dress-making school.

loans.use: to buy clothing material for making dresses for selling

loans.name: Los Ángeles De Charlies Group

texts.es:
El grupo los Ángeles de Charlies lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Karla Vanessa quien se dedica a la venta de comida desde hace 6 años. Este negocio lo inicio llevando unos cuantos platos de comida a los trabajadores de la panadería donde trabaja y poco a poco fue creciendo empezó hacer fresco y realizar desayunos. Ella  invertirá en granos básicos, huevos, carne…etc.
Las otras integrantes son Raquel quien vende totillas y tiene una pequeña venta desde hace 10 años y Gloria quien tiene una pulpería hace 3 años.
texts.en:
Los Ángeles de Charlies (Charlie’s Angels) is a group composed of three hard working and resourceful people. Karla Vanessa is one of them, and she has been engaged in selling meals for 6 years. She started this activity by bringing some dishes to the employees of the bakery where she worked; then, little by little her activity grew and she began preparing refreshments and breakfasts. She will invest the loan in the purchase of basic grains, eggs and meat among other products.
The other members of the group are Raquel, who sells tortillas and has been running a small stall for 10 years, and Gloria, who has been running a corner shop for 3 years.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, eggs and meat.

loans.name: Perla Soraya

texts.es: Perla, se acerca a institución a solicitar su primer crédito para comprar mercancía ya  que  ella  tiene  un negocio de  venta de ropa usada, el  cual le permite  salir adelante  día  con día, en  esta  ocasión requiere  de  nuestro  apoyo  ya  que  requiere  realizar  la  compra  de mercancía  para  seguir  trabajando ,  ya  que nos  comenta  que  sus  clientes  han  incrementado  de manera  satisfactoria, ella  se  preocupa  por  brindarles  el excelente servicio  que  la a  caracterizado  por  que   sabe  que  de  esta  manera  hará   crecer  su  negocio  y  podrá  tener  una excelente  estabilidad  económica.
texts.en: Perla has come to our institution to ask for her first loan in order to buy some products for the second-hand clothes shop that she runs and that helps her getting ahead day by day. In this occasion she is asking for our help to buy some products to keep on working: she has told us that there has been a satisfactory increase in the number of her customers, and that she worries about offering them the excellent service she is known for because she knows that in this way she will make her activity grow and she will succeed in reaching an excellent economic stability.

loans.use: To buy used clothes.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es: Nilda  de 44 años de edad vive en la ciudad de Cartagena  con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 3 y 6 años. Aquí tiene un restaurante, que genera ingresos para el apoyo al bienestar de su familia. Ella aprendió las tareas propias de la preparación y manejo de alimentos, cuando trabajó como empleada en un restaurante que tenia su madre en el mercado público. Este mismo lo entregó su madre a ella porque presentó problemas de salud. Con su restaurante ha tenido muchos desafíos que enfrentar, como los momentos en los cuales estuvo la vía para el metro en construcción y sus ventas disminuyeron, por eso debió restructurarlo y ubicarlo en su propia vivienda, En la actualidad su negocio está en crecimiento y cada día aumenta su clientela. Con sus ganancias apoya el gasto familiar al lado de su esposo que es un trabajador independiente estacionario. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con él comprará mesas, sillas plásticas abanicos un congelador, infraestructura con la cual planea mantener a su cliente confortable, para que regrese y se fidelice. Su meta es tener suficiente capital de trabajo permanente para adecuar su negocio y a futuro adquirir su propia casa.  Mientras trabaja para alcanzar sus sueños maneja en su negocio una autonomía del 100% una rentabilidad no menor de un 23,5% y una rotación de cuentas por cobrar de 3 días; indicadores financieros desde los cuales se proyecta su crecimiento.
texts.en: Nilda is 44 years old and lives in the city of Cartagena with her partner and her two children ages 3 and 6.  Here she has a restaurant that generates income to support the well-being of the family.  She learned the work of preparing and managing food when she worked as an employee in the restaurant that her mother had in the public market.  That same restaurant was given to Nilda by her mother because her mom began to have health problems.  With her restaurant she has had many challenges that she has had to face, like the times when the metro stop was under construction and her sales went down.  For that reason she had to restructure and locate the business in her own home.  Currently her business is growing and each day her customer base increases.  With her earnings she supports the family expenses along with her husband who is an independent stationary contractor.  Her Kiva credit is the first financing that she has received through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, a Kiva field partner.  With the loan she will purchase tables, plastic chairs, fans, and a freezer.  This infrastructure will help her keep her customers comfortable so that they will return and become faithful clients.  Her goal is to have sufficient capital from permanent work to be able to support her business and in the future buy her own home.  While she works to achieve her dreams she runs her business 100% autonomously, with no less than 23.5% profitability, and with a rotation of bills to be paid of three days.  These are the financial indicators from which she projects her growth.

loans.use: to purchase tables, plastic chairs, fans, and a freezer.

loans.name: Duverlys

texts.es: Duverlys  de 34 años de edad vive con su cónyuge y sus tres hijos en las edades de 10 a 12 años. Ella inició desde hace 6 años su experiencia de negocios con su madre, mediante una tienda donde vendía ranchos, víveres, abarrotes  y artículos de la canasta familiar. Ella debió salir con su familia de su vivienda, pues fue desplazada y debió irse a vivir donde su hermana y volvió a iniciar allí su negocio, aunque con unos pocos productos de la canasta familiar,  hace 7 meses; con su persistente trabajo ha logrado avanzar un poco, pero su gran desafío es el capital de trabajo, que se torna insuficiente ante sus planes de crecimiento, pues necesita también ayudar mucho mas a su marido en los gastos de su hogar, quien trabaja en una parcela cultivando y criando animales. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará en mayor cantidad, víveres, abarrotes y productos de dulcería, pues está ubicada frente a un colegio y su sueño es poder vender mucho mas, teniendo en la oferta lo que el cliente realmente necesita, para prosperar y salir adelante con su familia y poder brindarle una buena eduación y bienestar a sus hijos.
texts.en: Duverlys is 34 years old and lives with her husband and their three children, who range in age from 10 to 12.  Her business experience began 6 years ago when she and her mother opened a store that sold groceries and other basic necessities.  However, Duverlys and her family later had to leave their home, since they were displaced and had to go to live with her sister.  She restarted her business 7 months ago, though with only a few basic staple items.  By working persistently she has managed to make some progress, but her biggest challenge is working capital, since she doesn’t have enough for her growth plans.  She also needs more money so she can help her husband with the household expenses; he works farming a parcel of land and raising livestock.  That is why Duverlys has decided to take out a loan.  This is her first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, and she will use it to purchase a larger amount of groceries, supplies, and sweets.  Her business is located in front of a school, and she offers her customers items that they really need.  Duverlys’s dream is to sell much more so that her business will prosper and she can get ahead with her family and provide her children with a good education and quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a larger amount of groceries, supplies, and sweets.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
Mohamed is a 44-year-old carpenter in Mariakani. He is married and a father of five children. His business has successfully been in operation for the past thirteen years. 

This marks his fifth loan from KADET LTD to finance his business. With the loan, he plans to purchase two smoothening planes, one jack plane, screw drivers and a chisel.

He will use the profits to start a poultry-keeping business and repay his loan. He hopes to have a prosperous family and well-educated children.

loans.use: to purchase carpentry tools

loans.name: Adalicia

texts.es:
Adalicia, se dedica a la venta de mariscos y frutas, vive con toda su familia, ella está soltera, el negocio de mariscos nació hace más de 30 años, es un trabajo de familia, por eso mismo ella se dedica a esta actividad pero además quiso ofrecer fruta fresca para diversificar los productos.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de pescado, camarón, también comprara frutas como manzanas, fresas, peras, uvas, esta compra le ayudara para tener más amplio el negocio.
La aspiración de Adalicia es aumentar en las ventas y con ello poder mejorar los ingresos familiares
texts.en: Adalicia works selling seafood and fruit.  She lives with her family, she is single, and her seafood business began more than 30 years ago.  It is a family business, and for that reason she is dedicated to this activity but she also wanted to offer fresh fruit in order to diversify the products.  She is asking for a loan to purchase fish and shrimp, and she will also by fruits like apples, strawberries, pears, and grapes.  These purchases will help her to increase her business.  Adalicia's aspiration is to increase sales and thereby improve the family income.

loans.use: to purchase fish, shrimp, and fruit.

loans.name: Manuel Israel

texts.es:
Manuel, tiene 46 años de edad, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos, todos son menores y estudian, él se dedica a una tienda de productos domésticos, trabaja de lunes a domingo, está instalada en su vivienda, su esposa le ayuda a atender el negocio, tiene 20 años de existir.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para surtir el negocio de arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite, galletas, boquitas, bebidas, entre otras que son de mucha demanda, este préstamo le ayudara para mejorar el inventario y continuar sirviendo bien.
La aspiración de Manuel es que su negocio prospere, a través de este préstamo, mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Manuel is 46 years old and lives with his wife and his three children, all of whom are young and still in school.  He dedicates himself to a store that sells  household products.  He works from Monday through Sunday.  The business is in his home and his wife helps him with the business.  It has been in place for 20 years.  He is asking for a loan in order to buy merchandise in order to stock the business with rice, sugar, beans, oil, crackers, snacks, drinks, and other things that are in great demand.  This loan will help him to improve his inventory and continue serving his customers well.  Manuel's aspiration is that his business will prosper, improving the quality of his family's life.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, beans, oil, crackers, snacks, and drinks

loans.name: Abdurahaman

texts.en:
Abdurahaman is a 30-year-old businessman who sells coconuts in Kilifi. He is married and a father of six children. He has been doing this business for the last twelve years with great success. 

This is his second business loan from KADET LTD. He plans to purchase more coconuts to sell to his customers. He will use the anticipated profits to repay his loan and educate his children.
 
He hopes to have an expanded, well-known business.

loans.use: to purchase more coconuts for sale

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is a 52-year-old widowed woman. She has 4 children with ages ranging from 15 years to 32 years. She describes herself to be a religious woman. 

Rose operates a grocery store where she sells items such as bananas, onions, and tomatoes. In addition, she also provides rental house services. She has been involved in this business for 7 years. Her business is located in a viable area and her primary customers are women. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds to improve the grocery store. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to pay for the renovation of the rental houses. Rose's dream and business goal is to own another rental house within 5 years.

loans.use: to pay for the renovation of rental houses

loans.name: Manuela Ramos Group

texts.es: La Srta. Olinda tiene 21 años de edad,  es soltera  actualmente es socia en la alcancía comunal “Manuela Ramos” grupo  conformado por  9 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio.  Olinda  trabaja los fines de semana de mesera en un restaurante y a  su vez estudia Computacion. Olinda solicito el prestamo para comprar sillas y carpetas para empezar a dar clases de computacion , olinda espera que este nuevo negocio cresca con mucho esfuerzo y dedicacion. Olinda lograra todas sus metas y  sabe que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en: Olinda is 21 years old, she is single and she is a member of “Manuela Ramos”, a Community Bank composed of 9 members who engage in different retailing activities. Olinda works every week-end as waitress in a restaurant, and she studies computer sciences. Olinda is requesting a loan to buy chairs and desks to start teaching Computer classes: she hopes this new activity will grow thanks to her great effort and serious dedication. Olinda will reach all of her goals, and she knows that the loans from Edaprospo will help her achieving them.

loans.use: To buy chairs and desks.

loans.name: Yanira Lissete

texts.es:
Yanira, vive con su hija en casa propia, ella es comerciante administrando un negocio de variedades, ofrece ropa, sandalias, carteras, el negocio lo inicio hace tres años con el apoyo de su familia.
Ella necesita comprar mercadería para surtir su negocio y comprar artículos que más solicitan sus clientes como: carteras, cinchos, zapatos, ropa para damas y caballeros, de esa forma lograra tener variedad.
El sueño de Yanira es siempre mantener su negocio estable y surtido para darles una mejor atención a sus clientes y sobre todo ayudar con los gastos de la casa y a su hija en el estudio.
texts.en:
Yanira lives with her daughter in her own house.  She works as a vendor and has a varieties shop where she sells clothing, sandals, and handbags.  She started her business three years ago with support from her family.

Yanira needs to purchase merchandise so she can restock her business and purchase items that are most in demand from her customers, such as handbags, belts, shoes, and men and women’s clothing.  She will be able to offer greater variety with these items.

Yanira’s dream is to keep her business stable and well-stocked so she can provide her customers with better service.  Most of all, she wants to meet the household expenses and help her daughter with her studies.

loans.use: to purchase handbags, belts, shoes, and men and women’s clothing.

loans.name: Maria Del Transito

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de verduras y frutas frescas, vive con su esposo y tres hijos, la vivienda es propia, el negocio lo tiene en el mercado, un lugar fijo y accesible para los clientes, tiene 10 años de estar en este lugar.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de frutas como manzanas, bananos, papayas, ciruelas, y el rento en verduras como güisquiles, repollo, papas, este préstamo le ayudara para mejorar el inventario, manteniendo de frutos frescos.
Ella aspira crecer en el negocio, construir a futuro una casa para sus hijos, espera lograrlo a través del buen uso de los financiamientos.
texts.en: María works selling vegetables and fresh fruit.  She lives with her husband and three children.  The house is her own.  She has the business in the market, a stable location and accessible to the customers.  She has been in that location for 10 years.  She is asking for a loan in order to purchase fruits like apples, bananas, papaya, plums, and the rest to purchase vegetables like chayote, cabbage, and potatoes.  This loan will help her to improve her inventory, maintaining fresh fruit.  She hopes to grow the business, to construct in the future a house for her children.  She is hoping to achieve this through the good use of loans.

loans.use: To purchase fruit like apples, bananas, papaya, and plums.

loans.name: Silvia Daniela

texts.es:
Silvia, es soltera, ella se dedica a  la fabricación de pan dulce y pan francés desde hace 3 años el cual lo aprendió de su abuela juntas se dedican al mismo negocio todos los días de la semana.
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar los materiales para elaborar el pan como: harina, manteca y azúcar, de esa forma lograra aumentar en su produccion y ventas.
El objetivo de Silvia es siempre mantener estable su negocio, cubrir varios lugares en tiendas para repartir el pan y lograr estudiar en la universidad para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Silvia is single and has made sweet bread and French bread for 3 years. She learned from her grandmother and together they work at the same business every day of the week. 

She needs the loan to buy the ingredients to make the bread, such as: flour, lard and sugar and thus increase her production and sales. Silvia's objective is always to maintain a stable business, cover various stores to deliver her bread and go to the university to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy flour, lard and sugar.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella es comerciante de ropa, vende desde hace 10 años, el negocio lo tiene en el mercado en una zona accesible y de la cual ya tienen conocimiento muchos clientes, en el negocio ofrece prendas de vestir para damas, caballeros y niños.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de ropa nueva, blusas, camisas formales, vestidos, ropa interior, que le ayude a crecer en la venta, ofreciendo nuevos estilos.
La aspiración de María es que sus hijos puedan terminar sus estudios, para que tengan mejores oportunidades de superación.
texts.en: María lives with her husband and their two children.  She is a clothing salesperson and has been selling for the past 10 years.  She has her business in the market of an accessible zone and in that area she knows many of the clients.  In the business she offers clothing for women, men and children.  She is asking for a loan in order to purchase new clothes, blouses, dress shirts, dresses, and underwear, which will help her increase sales by offering new styles.  María's aspiration is that her children will be able to finish their studies so that they can have better opportunities to get ahead.

loans.use: To purchase new clothes, blouses, dress shirts, and dresses.

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.es:
Leonardo, vive con su esposa y un hijo de 4 años de edad, tiene un taller de estructuras metálicas, trabaja de lunes a viernes, sus trabajos son por contrato, el horario es de 7:00am en delante.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales para la elaboración de puertas, ventanas y balcones, como hierro de diferentes medidas, láminas, pintura y lijas, con estos materiales estará preparado para realizar el trabajo de los clientes. 
La aspiración de Leonardo es tener un taller más amplio, hacerse de herramientas más nuevas y prácticas, tambien quiere prosperar junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Leonardo lives with his wife and 4 year old son. He has a metallic structure workshop. He works Monday through Friday and works by contract. His schedule is from 7:00 a.m. on.

He is asking for a loan to buy materials to make doors, windows and balconies, such as pieces of iron in different sizes, sheeting, paint and files. With these materials he will be preparing to do jobs for his customers. 

Leonardo aspires to having a bigger workshop, making himself bigger and newer tools, and prosper with his family.

loans.use: to buy different sizes of pieces of iron, sheeting, paint and sandpaper.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: La Sra. María  tiene 50 años,  es casada tiene un hijo de la edad de 15 años se dedica a la venta de comidas en su puesto de venta que se encuentran en la zona Imperial,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  la Sra. María  utilizara  este préstamo para la  compra de frízer y horno industrial para su negocio, ya que la razón para solicitar este préstamo es ampliación del negocio y esto le permitira brindar un mejor servicio, La Sra. María enfrenta retos en su negocio que es la de incrementar la cantidad de clientes y ser mejor que la competencia y utilizar los beneficios en el de mejorar su negocio, su sueño de la Sra. es ver a su hija profesional se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mrs. María is 50 years old and is married with one child of 15 years.  She works selling food in her food stall that can be found in the Imperial Zone.  This loan is her first with the Kiva field partner institution.  Mrs. María will use the loan to purchase a freezer and an industrial oven for her business, since the reason for requesting this loan is to grow her business and this will permit her to offer better service.  Mrs. María has faced challenges in her business which include increasing the number of clients and being better than the competition, as well as utilizing benefits to improve her business.  María's dream is to see her daughter become a happy professional and she is thankful for the help that the Kiva partner institution has offered.

loans.use: to purchase a freezer and an industrial oven

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es: Petrona es una emprendedora que se le ha brindado el apoyo en el financiamiento para umentar su producto y ofrecerles a sus clientes, ya ha venido trabajando con Fundación León 2000 en el cual ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y con muchos deseos de superación. Actualmente esta emprendedora está solicitando financiamiento para la compra de tortillas, granos básicos, entre otros productos.
texts.en: Petrona is a hardworking woman who has been given financial support in order to increase her inventory and offer more to her customers.  She has been working with the Kiva partner Fundación León 2000, and she has demonstrated herself to be a responsible person with great desire to succeed.  Currently this hard-working woman is asking for a loan in order to buy tortillas, basic grains and other products.

loans.use: to buy tortillas, basic grains and other products.

loans.name: Residenciales El Campo N° 2 Group

texts.es: Santos Blacina tiene 51 años de edad, es casada, tiene cuatro hijos, y es integrante del Grupo Solidario Residenciales El Campo Nº 2. Santos se dedica a la venta de productos cosmeticos, ella decidio inscribirse al programa de venta por catalogo de Avon y como trabaja en una farmacia en sus tiempos libres hace visitas domiciliarias y va enseñando los productos en los catalogos y cuando no cuenta con mucho tiempo los deja y luego regresa. Una de sus dificultades es que da credito y algunas veces sus clientes le quedan mal con la fecha de pago. El prestamo lo necesita para comprar mas y variados productos de belleza como ser: esmalte de uñas, sombras de ojos, delineador de ojos y labios, rimel, entre otros. Los prestamos obtenidos le han ayudado a tener su propia casa porque antes no tenia. Unas de sus dificultades es que vende de forma ambulante y cuando le pagan ella tiene que movilizarse con dinero en efectivo y la han asaltado varias veces. Su meta es trabajar muy duro cada dia para tener su propio local. Ha sido clienta de FAMA por mas de 21 ciclos y ha demostrado alta responsabilidad en el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Santos Blacina is 51 years old and married with four children. She is a member of the Residenciales El Campo Nº 2 Solidarity Group. She sells cosmetics and decided to sign up with the program to sell Avon products by catalog. As she works in a pharmacy and makes home visits, in her free time she shows the products in the catalogs, leaving the catalogs behind if there isn’t much time and then returning for them later.

One of the problems is that Santos provides credit and sometimes her customers default on their payments when due. She needs the loan to buy more and a greater variety of beauty products, such as nail polish, eye shadow, eye liner, lip liner and mascara, among other items. 

The loans Santos has obtained have helped her to have her own house because before she did not own it. One of her problems is that she is a traveling salesperson and when she is paid she has to move around carrying cash and she has been assaulted several times. Her goal is to work very hard each day in order to have her own shop. She has been a client of FAMA for more than 21 loan cycles and has shown great responsibility in making her payments on time.

loans.use: to puchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Jehad

texts.en:
Jehad is a 41-year- old married woman from Al Nasser, Amman, Jordan and a mother of three children.

Jehad is a micro entreprenur working from her home. She sells accessories, blankets, clothes and many other goods.

Jehad is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase additional quantities of goods such as accessories and blankets.

Jehad is looking to purchase a car and provide her children with a good amount of money for their higher education.

loans.use: to purchase goods for her store

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es: La señora Daniela  tiene como actividad  principal la elaboración y venta  de queso, ella tiene sus vacas que le proveen de leche, vive con su esposo que es profesor rural y también se dedica a la crianza de ganado, el momento de la visita se encontraba vendiendo sus quesos en una de  las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto,  esta actividad es su principal fuente de ingreso para ellos, en esta ocasión solicitan financiamiento para la compra de terreno rustico para la siembra de forraje (alfa alfa) para mejorar sus ganados y tener mejores ingresos, la Sra. Daniela es una persona joven con ganas de superación se siente feliz y agradecido con la institución por la poyo brindado.
texts.en: Daniela’s main economic activity is making and selling cheese.  She has her own cows that provide her with milk.  She lives with her husband, who is a rural school teacher and also makes a living raising cattle.  At the time of Emprender’s visit Daniela was selling her cheeses at a street market in the city of El Alto.  This activity is her family’s biggest source of income.  She and her husband are asking for a loan so they can purchase rural land on which to grow fodder (alfalfa).  This will allow them to improve the quality of their cattle and thus have better income.  Daniela has aspirations to succeed, and is grateful to the lending institution for the support it provides.

loans.use: to purchase land for growing fodder.

loans.name: Madikhoja

texts.ru: Мадиходжа женат и ответственный отец двоих маленьких детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. Жена домохозяйка и присматривает за детьми. Более 2-х лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Мадиходжа запрашивает займ в размере 2000 Сомони для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений, горюче-смазочных материалов и ядохимикаты.
texts.en: Madikhoja is married and is a responsible father of two small children. He is very hardworking and a purposeful man. His wife is a homemaker and looks after the children. He has been cultivating crops for more than two years. Madikhoja is asking for a loan in the amount of 2,000 somoni to buy seeds, mineral fertilizer, fuel and lubricants and chemicals.

loans.use: to buy seeds, mineral fertilizer, pesticides, fuel and lubricants.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is a married woman. She has 3 children with ages ranging from 5 years to 11 years. She describes herself to be honest and God-fearing. 

Esther operates a beauty saloon where she provides hair services such as blowdry, plaiting, etc. She has been involved in this business for 15 years and employs 2 staff members. Her business is located in a strategic business area and her primary customers are both women and men. She describes her biggest business challenge to be the varying prices of beauty products. 

Esther will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more beauty products. Her business goal is to run a hairdressing school within 5 years.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Justus

texts.en:
Justus is a 50-year-old a business man.  He is a widower with five children. He has been operating a motorcycle transport for the past ten years and earns a monthly income of KES 15,000 which he uses to support his family.

Justus is applying for his third loan from KADET LTD, after repaying the previous loans successfully. Justus will use the loan to buy another motorbike.  With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hope and dream is to buy a taxi car.

loans.use: buy a motorbike

loans.name: Maria Elizabeth

texts.en:
44-year-old Maria Elizabeth is a farmer from Bien Unido, Bohol. She is married and has 5 children with ages between 4 and 20.

Maria Elizabeth has been in the business of rice farming for 20 years. She earns 8000 PHP per month doing this business. She works hard to sustain her children's education. 

Maria Elizabeth applied for a loan to purchase fertilizers and other farm inputs. She hopes for this loan to help her achieve a better yield.  Maria Elizabeth also hopes for her children to have bright futures.

loans.use: buy fertilizers and farm inputs

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane lives in Yei. She sells from a food stall and has been in business for six years. She is 30 years old, married, and has six children --  three of them are still in school. 

Jane heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer.  This is her thirds loan from BRAC.  She has requested a loan of SDG 1000 in order to purchase tomatoes and onions. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay school fees.

loans.use: buy tomatoes and onions

loans.name: Sophia

texts.en:
Sophia is a 47-year-old single lady blessed with two children that she supports. She has been operating a bead works business for the last one and a half year, earning a monthly income of KES 19,000. 

Sophia has applied for her first loan of KES 40,000 from KADET LTD, which she intends to use to purchase beads and art items for her shop.  The anticipated profits will be used to diversify into poultry farming. Her future plans is to expand her business and invest for a better family living standards.

loans.use: purchase beads and other art items

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 33 years old.  He is from Nakuru and has a spare parts business that he has been running for the past 6 years. He is married to Susan and they don’t have a baby yet.

Joseph has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD to enable him to buy more spare parts for his motorbike and bicycle. He is optimistic that his business will do well after the loan.  He hopes to open a spare parts shop in the future.

loans.use: buy spare parts

loans.name: Hamisi

texts.en:
Hamisi is a 40-year-old married man. He has 3 children with ages ranging from 4 years to 17 years. He describes himself to be patient. 

Hamisi operates a retail store where he sells items such as sweets, bread, milk, etc. He has been involved in this business for 3 years. His business is located in an ideal place for business and his primary customers are both men and women.  He describes his biggest business challenge to be the high prices of home products. 

Hamisi will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more home products to sell.  His business goal is to run a supermarket within 5 years.

loans.use: buy more soap and household products

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary lives in Yei. She sells charcoal and has been in business for six years. She is 40 years old, married, and has six children -- three of them are still in school. 

Mary heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer.  This is her thirds loan from BRAC.   She has requested a loan of SDG 1500 in order to purchase more charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay school fees.

loans.use: buy charcoal

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
Francisca is a 40-year-old a business lady.  She is married to Boniface, a farmer. They are blessed with four children.  Francisca has been a tailor for the past three years and earns a monthly income of KES 15,000 which she uses to support her family.

Francisca is applying for her fifth loan from KADET LTD after repaying the previous loans successfully. She will use the loan to buy clothing materials.  With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her children. Her hope and dream is to open a wholesale shop.

loans.use: buy tailoring materials

loans.name: Rosa Gerardina

texts.es:
La Señora. Rosa es socia del banco comunal El Cisne, vive por la parroquia del Valle llamada también “San Bautista de El Valle” y está situada al sureste de Cuenca. Esta parroquia es famosa por su  producción agrícola, también su gente se dedica a la cría de animales, al comercio y muchos laboran en la ciudad de Cuenca. El Valle tiene atractivos como la laguna de Cochapamba (llenas de totoras) y varios lugares más para visitar.

La Señora. Rosa tiene 35 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos de 21, 18, 16, 7, 3 de edad, su primer hijo trabaja y estudia en el colegio, sus dos siguientes hijos trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, su cuarto hijo estudia en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora en el área de la construcción como albañil, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad. 

Doña Rosa se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y como la mayor parte de su tiempo pasa en casa se dedica a la cría pollos, cuyes, cerdos y conejos a los que los vende en su comunidad o en días de ferias.
 
Es socia fundadora del banco comunal y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos, cuyes y cerdos para continuar con esta actividad.

Su meta es tener un criadero más grande para crecer en el negocio.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosa is a member of El Cisne Communal Bank. She lives in El Valle parish, also called San Bautista de El Valle, which is located southeast of Cuenca. This parish is famous for its agricultural production. Also its people are devoted to raising small animals and to commerce and many work in the city of Cuenca. El Valle has attractions such as Cochapamba Lake (full of cattails) and several other places to visit.

Rosa is 35 years old and married with 5 children, ages 21, 18, 16, 7 and 3. Her oldest son works and studies at school and the two that follow work and help her financially. Her fourth son studies in a little school in the city. Her husband works in the area in construction as a bricklayer. The house is their property. 

Rosa engages in household tasks. As she spends most of her time at home, she also raises chickens, guinea pigs, pigs and rabbits, which she sells in her community and on market days.

She is a founding member of the communal bank and she will invest her new loan in the purchase of chickens, guinea pigs and pigs to continue with this endeavor.

Her goal is to have a larger breeding farm in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, guinea pigs and pigs.

loans.name: Tabitha

texts.en:
Tabitha is a 69-year-old business lady.  She is a widow with three adult children. She has been selling cereals for the past ten years and earns a monthly income of KES 10,000, which she uses to support her family.

Tabitha is applying for her first loan from KADET LTD after being introduced by a KADET staff.  She will use the loan to buy dry maize and beans to stock her business.  With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her grandchildren. Her hope and dream is to open a retail shop.

loans.use: buy dry maize and beans

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty lives in Yei. She operates a food stall and has been in business for two years. She is 31 years old, married, and has two children --  both of them are still in school. 

Betty heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer.  This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of SDG 500 in order to purchase maize and cassava flour. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay school fees.

loans.use: buy maize and cassava flour

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is a 58-year-old business man.  He is married to Mildred, a farmer.  They are blessed with two children. He has been in a posho mill business as a primary business and a mixed crop farming business for the past five years, earning a monthly income of KES 20,000 which he uses to support his family.

Peter is applying for his first loan from KADET LTD after being introduced by a KADET staff.  He will use the loan to buy sacks of maize and seedlings. With the anticipated profit from the two businesses, he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to buy a piece of land and build rental houses.

loans.use: buy maize and seedlings

loans.name: Piruz

texts.en:
Piruz is 66 years old. She lives in the village of Meore Obcha in West Georgia with her husband Zurab. Piruz and Zurab are retired. 

Along with their monthly pensions, which totals 220 Laris per month, the main source of the income for the family is agriculture. They have a milk cow.  Piruz produces cheese and sells it in the local market. Also the family owns a pig and sells on average 10 piglets per month. Along with the above-mentioned, Piruz and Zurab own a vineyard with 1000 vine-trees.  Zurab produces wine and sells it in local market as well. The total average monthly income for the family is 550 Laris, including their monthly pensions. 

Piruz requested credit to purchase an additional milk cow. With two milk cows, she will be able to double the production and sales of cheese.  This will significantly increase the income for the family. They will be able to purchase additional household goods to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: buy a milk cow

loans.name: Kimani

texts.en:
Kinami is a 60-year-old a business man.  He is married to Nzambi, a farmer. They are blessed with six children. He has been selling cereals for the past 20 years and earns a monthly income of KES 7,500 which he uses to support his family.

Kinami is applying for his first loan from KADET LTD after being introduced by a KADET staff member. He will use the loan to buy dry beans and maize for his business.  With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hope and dream is to build a store for storing the grains.

loans.use: buy dry beans and maize

loans.name: Mirasol

texts.en:
27-year-old Mirasol is a married woman with 2 children, aged 2 and 3. She and her husband run a fishing business in Bien Unido, Bohol. Mirasol's husband operates their fishing boat. Mirasol sells her husband's catch at the market.  She works hard to improve their business and take care of her kids.

Mirasol has requested this loan to purchase a boat engine.  She hopes to earn better and be able to save for her children's future education.

loans.use: to purchase a boat engine

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is a 56-year-old mixed crop farmer.  She is married to Simon, a business man. They are blessed with two children. She has been in the faming business for the past ten years and earns a monthly income of KES 5,000 which she uses to support her family.

Alice is applying for her first loan form KADET LTD after being introduced by a KADET staff member.  She will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm.  With the anticipated profit form the business, she will educate her children. Her hope and dream is to open a retail shop.

loans.use: buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm

loans.name: Roman Chubinidze

texts.en:
Roman is 59 years old. He lives in the village of Dimi in West Georgia with his family: wife Manana and two daughters (22 and 21 years old). Roman’s younger daughter is a student and the elder one works as a hotel administrator in a nearby town. 

Roman and Manana lead the agricultural business for  the family, which is the main source of the income for the family. In particular, the family runs a small dairy farm with 2 milk cows and a calf. Manana produces cheese and sells on average 12 kilos of this product each Friday at the open market in the nearby town. Along with the dairy farm, the family owns a vineyard with 1200 vine-trees. Roman produces wine and sells it in the village.  The total average monthly income for the family is 1000 Laris. 

Roman requested credit to purchase a tractor. He will cultivate the land owned by the family where vegetables will be grown. Roman will sell the harvested vegetables. Also, Roman will use the tractor to provide seasonal agricultural services to local farmers. This will significantly increase the income for his family and they will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: purchase a tractor

loans.name: Ingoboka / Nyng Group

texts.fr:
Shafi fait partie du groupe Habimvugano. Il a 56 ans et il est marié, avec 7 enfants de 19 ans à 34 ans, dont 2 scolarises. Il a 2 personnes dans son charge autre que ses enfants Son niveau d’éducation est de 5 ans de primaire.

Shafi est agriculteur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter, des fertilisants et payer la main d’œuvre.

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d’utilise des semences de race améliore. Dans les prochaines années, Shafi voudrait être un grand agriculteur dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit  de payer le frais scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Shafi is part of the group Habimvugano. He is 56 years old and married, and he has seven children, from 19 to 34 years old. Two of the children are in school. He has two other children  to support aside from his own. He has a fifth grade education.

Shafi is a rice farmer. This loan cycle is his first one with the microfinance institution ACB. He is going to use his loan to buy some fertilizer and to cover the cost of labor. 

His strategy for the growth of this business is to use improved types of seeds. In the next few years, Shafi would like to be a major farmer in his region. He plans on using the profits for paying his children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to cover the cost of labor

loans.name: William Enrique

texts.es:
William, vive con su familia, su abuela y un hermano, es soltero, se dedica a la venta de medicinas, este negocio lo inicio con el apoyo de unos amigos, trabaja de forma ambulante, no tiene horario fijo.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de medicamentos para salir a vender, como vitaminas, analgésicos, esta compra le ayudara para crecer y mejorar la atención a los clientes, también ampliarse a otras zonas.
La aspiración de William es tener un negocio más amplio en un lugar fijo, donde pueda atraer más clientela y tener más seguridad en los ingresos familiares.
texts.en:
William lives with his family, his grandmother, and a brother.  He is single and works selling medicine.  He started this business with the support of a few friends.  He works on foot and does not have a set schedule.

Currently he is requesting a loan to buy medicine to go out and sell, such as vitamins and pain killers.  This purchase will help him grow and improve customer service, as well as expanding to other areas.

William's goal is to have a bigger business in a fixed place where he can attract more customers and have more security for the family income.

loans.use: to buy medicine to sell.

loans.name: Julia Evangelina

texts.es:
La Señora Julia es socia del banco comunal El Cisne, vive por la parroquia del Valle llamada también “San Bautista de El Valle” que está situada al sureste de Cuenca. Esta parroquia es famosa por su producción agrícola, también su gente se dedica a la cría de animales, al comercio y muchos laboran en la ciudad de Cuenca. El Valle tiene atractivos como la laguna de Cochapamba (llenas de totoras) y varios lugares más para visitar.

Doña Julia tiene 43 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos  de 17 y 15 años de edad, su primer hijo trabaja y le ayuda económicamente y su segundo hijo está estudiando en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo labora en la agricultura, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando, pero ya está en construcción su casa propia.
 
La Señora. Julia labora cuidando el ganado de su mamá de domingo a domingo, esta actividad la realiza hace un año. En su casa cría cerdos, pollos y cuyes.
 
En el banco comunal se encuentra en su segundo crédito y  lo va a invertir en la compra de cerdos, pollos y cuyes.
 
Su meta es terminar la construcción de su casa.
texts.en:
Julia is a member of El Cisne Communal Bank.  She lives in the parish of El Valle, known also as San Bautista de El Valle, located to the southeast of Cuenca.  This parish is famous for its agricultural production.  The people also work raising animals and in business, and many work in the city of Cuenca.  El Valle has attractions such as the lakes of Cochapamba (full of totora reeds) and various other places to visit.

Julia, 43, is married and has two children, ages 17 and 15, from her marriage.  Her first child works and helps her financially and her second child is studying in a high school in the city.  Her husband works in agriculture.  She does not have her own house so she rents, but her own house is already under construction.

Julia works taking care of her mother's livestock from Sunday through Sunday.  She has been doing this work for a year.  At home she raises pigs, chickens, and guinea pigs.

She is in her second cycle in the communal bank, and she is going to invest it in buying pigs, chickens, and guinea pigs.

Her goal is to finish building her house.

loans.use: to buy pigs, chickens, and guinea pigs.

loans.name: Maximiana

texts.en:
Maximiana earns a living through fishing. She is 41 years old, married, and has 7 children aged between 3 and 17. Maximiana's husband is a fisherman.

Maximiana has been engaged in fishing for 20 years. She and her husband work together to improve their business and sustain their family.  Maximiana said she ensures that her family is able to eat 3 times a day. She hopes for her family to have a better quality of life.

Maximiana plans to use her loan to purchase fishing nets, hooks and other materials. This will help her business and family immensely.

loans.use: buy fishing nets, hooks and fishing materials

loans.name: Payibe

texts.en:
Payibe lives in Yei. She sells charcoal and has been in business for five years. She is 35 years old, married, and has six children -- all of them are still in school. 

Payibe heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer.  This is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of SDG 1000 in order to purchase charcoal to sell. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay school fees.

loans.use: buy charcoal

loans.name: Saliou

texts.fr: Saliou est un homme marié polygamme avec 3 épouses. Il est père de 8 enfants dont les 5 sont des élèves.Il tient une boutique de vente de produits alimentaires au marché de sa localité. Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un pret de 250000f pour acheter du riz, du lait , du sucre et d'autres denrées de première nécessité. Son ambition est d'agrandir sa boutique.
texts.en:
Saliou is a married polygamous man who has three wives. He is a father of eight children, of whom five are students. He has a shop selling grocery items at the market in his town.

In order to bolster his business capital, he is requesting a loan of 250,000 francs to buy some rice, milk, sugar, and other basic goods. His ambition is to expand his store.

loans.use: to buy some rice, milk, sugar, and other basic goods

loans.name: Armando Alberto

texts.pt:
Nasceu no distrito de Boane, Província de Maputo, Sul de Moçambique, casado e pai de 3 filhos dos quais 1 maior de idade e 2 ainda frequentam a Escola. Fez a 4ª classe e parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos pais. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais um tio que vive com ele.

Trabalha como condutor de chapa há mais de 7 anos e tem um salário de 6.300.00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária.
Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de um amigo que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu terceiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 26.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção para a obra da sua casa (cimento, pedra, chapas, barrotes, ferro, e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de  13.000.00mt, e 15.000.00mt, que usou para habitação.
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e comprar um motor para a sua viatura e aumentar a frota de chapas, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Armando was born in Boane district of Maputo in southern Mozambique. He is a married father of three children, one is nearly an adult and the other two are still attending school.  Armando completed school through the fourth grade and had then to stop due to lack of financial support from his parents.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports an uncle who lives with them.

He works as a van driver for the past seven years and has a salary of 6.300.00mt per month, which he applies to household expenses and a small bank account.

He has never had a loan with other banks. He learned of Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of the institution. This is his third loan from Hluvuku in the amount of 26.000.00mt with which he plans to purchase construction materials for work on his house (cement, stone, slabs, beams, iron, and others). The previous loans were 13.000.00mt and 15.000.00mt that were also used for housing projects.

He is committed to repaying the loan in the future and plans to complete his home and buy a motor for his car to increase his fleet of vans, hopefully with additional Hluvuku loans.

loans.use: To buy cement, rocks, metal sheets, beams, iron, and other materials to expand his home.

loans.name: Mariana De Jesús

texts.es:
La Señora Mariana es socia del banco comunal El Cisne, vive por la parroquia del Valle llamada también “San Bautista de El Valle”  que está situada al sureste de Cuenca. Esta parroquia es famosa por su producción agrícola, también su gente se dedica a la cría de animales, al comercio y muchos laboran en la ciudad de Cuenca. El Valle tiene atractivos como la laguna de Cochapamba (llenas de totoras) y varios lugares más para visitar.

La Señora Mariana tiene 55 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 7 hijos, 4 son casados y viven independiente, sus hijos solteros son de 22, 18 y 16 años de edad, su hija de 22 años pasa en casa y ayuda en los quehaceres del hogar y sus dos hijos siguientes trabajan para solventar sus gastos personales. Su esposo es de profesión albañil, la casa en la que viven es de su propiedad.
 
Doña Mariana pasa en casa realizando los quehaceres del hogar y cuida de su familia, también se dedica a criar cuyes, cerdos y pollos a los que los vende en su comunidad.
 
En el banco comunal se encuentra hace 2 años y  su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos, cuyes y cerdos para crecer en esta actividad. 

Su meta es tener más capital para ser negociante de animales
texts.en:
Mariana is a member of El Cisne Communal Bank.  She lives in the parish of El Valle, also called San Bautista de El Valle, located to the southeast of Cuenca.  This parish is famous for its agricultural production.  The people there also work raising animals and in business, and many work in the city of Cuenca.  El Valle has attractions such as Cochapamba Lake (full of totora reeds) and various other places to visit.

Mariana is 55 years old and married, and has seven children from her marriage.  Four are married and live on their own.  Her single children are 22, 18, and 16.  Her 22-year-old daughter stays at home and helps with the housework and her next two children work to pay for their personal expenses.  Her husband is a bricklayer by profession.  The house they live in is their property. 

Mariana stays at home and does the housework and takes care of her family.  She also works raising guinea pigs, pigs, and chickens, which she sells in her community.

She has been with her communal bank for two years, and she is going to invest her loan in buying chickens, guinea pigs, and pigs to grow in this work.

Her goal is to have more capital to be an animal dealer.

loans.use: to buy chickens, guinea pigs, and pigs.

loans.name: Servando

texts.en:
Servando, age 50, is an entrepreneur from Trinidad, Bohol.  He is married with two children.

Servando is engaged in farming and fishing.  He primarily grows rice to sell.  Fishing augments his income.  Servando has a monthly income of about 7000 php. 

He plans to use his loan to purchase fertilizer and fish traps.  Servando plans to expand and focus on farming.  He also hopes to be a successful farmer.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and fish traps.

loans.name: Matano

texts.en:
Matano Leo is a 34 year old, married, video shop owner in Mombasa.  His business has successfully been in operation for the past six years.

This is his third business loan from KADET LTD . He plans to purchase more video tapes and a new DVD.  He will use the anticipated profits to renovate the video shop and repay his loan. 

He hopes to have well established business.

loans.use: to purchase more video tapes and a new DVD.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.en:
Vicente is a 36 year-old married man with two children, ages seven and 12.  His wife works as a cashier in a bakeshop. 

Vicente runs a "habal-habal" (motorcycle taxi) business and sells wholesale items at retail prices in Trinidad, Bohol.

Vicente works hard to provide for his family and send his kids to school.  

He requested this loan to purchase gasoline and items at wholesale that he can resell.  Vicente hopes this loan will help improve his businesses.

loans.use: to purchase gasoline and items at wholesale that he can resell.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 50 years old, married, business man who runs a butchery shop.  His wife is a farmer.  They are blessed with two children.  He has been in business for the past ten years, with the monthly income of about KES 5,500, which she uses to support his family.

He is applying for his second loan with KADET LTD, after repaying the previous loan successfully.  Joseph will use the loan to buy bulls for slaughtering. 

With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children.  His hopes and dreams are to open a restaurant.

loans.use: to buy bulls for slaughtering.

loans.name: Abena

texts.en:
Abena is a widow she lives with her seven dependents, at Jukwa near Abura.  

Abena sells plantains and Gari (ginger) which she has done for 30 years. 

As a single parent she uses her income to feed and cloth her children.   

She will use her loan to purchase plantains to sell.  With the new profit, Abena hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase plantains to sell.

loans.name: Veronica Yayaa

texts.en:
Veronica Yayaa  is a petty trader at Jukwa near Abura.  She trade pans, gari (ginger), bread, drinks, wigs and other items.  She has been in business for three years.  

Veronica is married to an account clerk  and has two children.  She uses her income to help pay their children’s school fees.  

Veronica will use her loan to purchase hair extensions, drinks and pans to resell.  With the new profit, she will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase hair extensions, drinks and pans to resell.

loans.name: Afia

texts.en:
Afia sells maize at Jukwa near Abura, which she has done for 14 years. 

Afia is married and has three children.  She uses her income to help pay their utility bills. 

Afia will use her loan to purchase bags of maize to sell.  With the new profit she hopes buy maize in large quantities.

loans.use: to purchase bags of maize to sell.

loans.name: Celandia Edelmira

texts.es:
Celandia es una mujer de 41 años, madre de 2 hijos de 12 y 8 años. Juntos viven en la parroquia "Abraham Calazacón" de Santo Domingo, que es la cuarta ciudad con mas población del Ecuador. Su población va creciendo rápidamente ya que cuenta con un rico comercio y el mayor mercado ganadero del país. Su temperatura habitual es de unos 25.5°C  y a veces llega a los 38 °C. Toda la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas"  figura como parte del territorio montañoso, toda la provincia es considerada nueva ya que fue creada en el 2007.

Celandia tiene un taller de confección de ropa desde hace 18 años, aprendió este oficio a través de cursos. Ella desea invertir comprando una cortadora de tela y más tela para incrementar su producción, y disminuir costos de producción y como consecuencia incrementar su margen de utilidad. Sus confecciones tienen una buena demanda ya que ella trabaja con calidad. Su sueño es tener un gran taller y poder dar trabajo a más personas. Trabaja un promedio de 9 horas al día.

Ella ama su trabajo, este es su primer crédito con Fundación Alternativa, que es la institución intermediaria entre Silvia y los prestamistas a nivel mundial del portal KIVA; sin embargo en la evaluación crediticia ella siempre ha sido puntual es los créditos que ha obtenido anteriormente. Le gusta Fundación Alternativa por la facilidad que ofrece y la atención de su asesor.
texts.en:
Celandia is a 41-year-old woman, the mother of two children, ages 12 and 8.  Together they live in the Abraham Calazacón parish of Santo Domingo, which is the fourth largest city in Ecuador.  The population is growing rapidly because it is rich in trade and has the largest livestock market in the country.  The normal temperature is about 25.5°C and sometimes reaches 38°C.  The entire Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas province is part of the mountainous region.  The entire province is considered new because it was created in 2007.

Celandia has had a dressmaking workshop for 18 years.  She learned this job by taking classes.  She wants to buy a fabric cutter and more fabric to increase her production and lower her production costs, and so increase her profit margin.  Her work is in high demand because she works with quality.  Her dream is to have a big workshop and be able to give work to more people.  She works an average of nine hours a day.

She loves her work.  This is her first loan with Fundación Alternativa, which is the intermediary institution between Silvia and the Kiva lenders at the worldwide level.  Nevertheless, in her credit evaluation she always has been punctual with the loans she has received previously.  She likes Fundación Alternativa because of the ease it offers and the service of the advisor.

loans.use: to buy a fabric cutter and fabric.

loans.name: Shoista

texts.ru: Шоиста добросовестная и порядочная женщина. Она замужем и любящая мать пятерых детей. Более 14 лет она занимается торговлей. Она продает картофель, лук, капусту и другие сельхозпродукции. Шоиста старается расширить свой бизнес, чтобы улучшить свои жилищные условия. С этой целью она запрашивает займ в размере 2500 Сомони для покупки сельхозпродукции. Она надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Shoista is an honest and decent woman. She is married and is a loving mother of five children. She has been selling for more than fourteen years. She sells potatoes, onions, cabbage and other agricultural crops. Shoista tries to expand her business so that she can improve her living conditions. She is asking for a loan with this purpose in the amount of 2,500 somoni to buy vegetables. She hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Revaz

texts.en:
Revaz is a 61 years old farmer from village Kvirike, West Georgia.  Revaz lives with his family: wife – Zhuzhuna, 33 years old son, daughter-in-law and two grandchildren (8 and 4 years old). Children go to school/kindergarten.  Zhuzhuna and her daughter-in-law work in a local school as teachers. 

Revaz and his son run an agricultural business, which is their main source of income.  They run a bee-keeping business.  The family owns 50 bee-hives with bee-colonies.  Revaz harvests honey twice a year and sells it at the local market.  His family also owns a citrus garden (.3 hectare).  Revaz and his son also sell their citrus at the local market.  Their total average monthly income is 1200 Laris. 

Revaz requested this loan to purchase sugar so he can feed his bees during early spring.  Also part of the loan will be used to purchase medicine, which is used for seasonal disinfection of his bee-hives.  After properly completed his seasonal work, the family hopes to generate a greater harvest of honey later in the year, and the income from sales will increase. 

Revaz plans to reinvest in his bee-keeping business.  He also hopes to purchase additional bee-hives for expansion.

loans.use: to purchase sugar and medicines for bees,

loans.name: Nyameke

texts.en:
