Mushviq is a 23-year-old young single man. He is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) and lives with his parents in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. He breeds cattle and has five years of experience in this field. Mushviq gets financial support from the government, but 100 AZN is too small an amount to cover the family’s needs. 

Cattle-breeding requires a lot of physical activity and spending most of the time in the open air. Pasturing takes 80% of Mushviq's time. He usually buys small calves, raises and fattens them for five to six months, and then resells them for a more profitable price in the livestock bazaar. His monthly income is 300 AZN and this business is only one source of financial income in his family. Meat is in very high demand in Azerbaijan and people use it in everyday dishes like pilau and dolma. 

Mushviq would like to purchase more cattle and for this purpose he applied for a loan of 700 AZN. He needs this loan to increase his monthly turnover and to cover the needs of his customers.

*IDP
An internally displaced person (IDP) is someone who has been forced to flee his or her home due to armed conflict, violence, human rights violations, or natural or manmade disasters, but who, unlike a refugee, has not crossed an international border (source: UN Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs).

loans.use: to buy one head of cattle.

loans.name: Mylene

texts.en:
Mylene is from Tagudalo, Aurora, Zamboanga Del Sur. She is twenty-six years old. Mylene is married and has one child. To make a living, Mylene manages a business venture, providing transport services. Mylene been in this business for two years and earns 2,500 PHP a month. 

In 2011, Mylene joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Mylene is requesting a loan of 7,000 PHP which will be used to repair and improve the motorcycle so it gives better service. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to repair and improve her motorcycle so it will give better service.

loans.name: Sanan

texts.en:
Sanan is a 24-year-old single man.  He sells food products such as macaronis, rice, candies, cookies, sugar and beverages in his shop. Sanan has 4 years of experience in this field, and is a knowledgeable and skilled person in his trade.

The food products he sells are very popular among people and are in high demand. His monthly profit from selling food is 300 AZN. This is a stable income and owing to it he was able to make renovation to his house.  His father helps him to sell products in his shop. Sanan is a very successful entrepreneur because of his good location, in the central bazaar of his home city.

Sanan would like to increase his sales and invest additional capital in his business. For this purpose, he applied for 1000 AZN. He will use it to purchase and diversify with additional foodstuff.

loans.use: buy food products

loans.name: Damian

texts.en:
Damian is married with five children. Damian is thirty-nine years old and lives in the Philippines.

Damian is operating a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living. He has been doing this for two years and every month he earn 6,000 PHP from this work. He has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to repair an existing vehicle so it gives better service.

Damian has been a member of GDMPC since the year 2011. In the future, Damian hopes he can pay for his children to finish studying, and to gain double the income from his business.

loans.use: to repair an existing vehicle so it gives better service.

loans.name: Thoeun

texts.en:
Thoeun is a thirty-year-old hard-working married man living with his wife and three children in Ang Snoul district. He’s the main income provider in his family and is striving to offer them a fair way of living. He has been working in the construction field since the year 2000, moving around the country with his building team. Typically, Thoeun is able to earn approximately USD 5.00 per day. The main obstacle that Thoeun faces is that he doesn't have a vehicle that provides him with good transport. However, Thoeun still tries hard to work continually by depending on his old bicycle to commute to his workplace.

As of now, Thoeun has applied for a loan from Kiva partner, HKL, to purchase a second-hand motorcycle to better his living conditions. Definitely, this Kiva loan will be a part of improving his family's life as well as improving his business further. He’s very happy and appreciative of our lenders.

loans.use: to purchase a second-hand motorcycle.

loans.name: Delgin

texts.en:
Delgin is a married woman with two children. Delgin is thirty years old, and resides at Tudela, Misamis Occidental: Philippines. 

Delgin owns and operates a farm, planting and harvesting bananas for sale to earn a living. She's been in this business for seven years. Each month, she earns 4,050 PHP doing this type of business. 

She requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase pesticides and pay the cost of planting bananas. In the future, Delgin wants to make improvements to her house and to help her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase pesticides and pay for planting bananas.

loans.name: Lilian Jeannette

texts.es:
Lilian, vive con sus dos hijos de 6 y 8 años de edad, es madre soltera, se dedica a la venta de ropa y cosméticos, tiene aproximadamente 8 años en el negocio, surgió por iniciativa propia, debido a la necesidad de tener una fuente de ingreso para sus hijos, su horario es de 8:000am a 5:00pm.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa nueva como shorts, camisas, blusas, para mantener la suficiente mercadería nueva para los clientes, este préstamo le ayudara para tener surtido con la oportunidad de generar mayores ventas.
Su aspiración es crecer en el negocio, tener un local grande y bien ubicado para que la demanda aumente y esto le de mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Lilian lives with her two children, aged 6 and 8.  She is a single mother who works selling clothing and cosmetics.  She has had her business for approximately eight years.  It came about on her own initiative, owing to her need to have a source of income for her children.  She works from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m..

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of new clothes such as shorts, shirts, and blouses, in order to have sufficient new merchandise for her customers.  This loan will help her to keep well-stocked, with the opportunity to generate increased sales.

Lilian's goal is to grow her business, and to have a large premises which would be well-located for her growing demand.  This would provide her with better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase new clothes such as shorts, shirts and blouses.

loans.name: Virgen Asunta Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN ASUNTA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ana; ella es soltera y tiene 38 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de venta de verduras y frutas, ella trabaja en forma independiente, la socia lleva a lugares como puerto Maldonado, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde vende verduras y frutas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar manzanas, naranjas, uvas, naranjas, platanos, papas, zanahorias, lechugas y tomates al por mayor.
 Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de taller de mecánico, negocio de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de servicio de taxi, negocio de  venta de golosinas.

El socio que esta pegado a la foto grupal vino un poco despues de la reunion porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the 'Virgen Asunta' community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Ana is a member of this group.  She is 38 years old, single, and has four children.  She has a fruit and veg. business and works independently.  She takes her products to places such as Puerto Maldonado to sell.  She works from 8.00am to 6.00pm and, through this business, she provides for her children.  Her dream is to have premises where she can sell her fruit and veg.  She is requesting this loan to buy apples, oranges, grapes, bananas, potatoes, carrots, lettuces and tomatoes wholesale.

The other members of this group run an auto repair shop, a grocery store, a taxi business and a business selling candies.  The member in the picture which is attached to the main photo arrived to the meeting a little late for work reasons.

Ana is grateful to the people who will take part in her dream in this way and pledges to make her loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy apples, oranges, grapes, bananas, potatoes, carrots, lettuces and tomatoes wholesale

loans.name: Edgar David

texts.es:
el señor Edgar David es casado, tiene 21 años de edad, cursó los grados de educación primaria, se dedica a la tejeduría, inicio este negocio son sus padres y hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica al tricotado de hilo.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de hilos de diferentes colores, y poder mejorar su producción de tejidos, ya que en el futuro espera tener capital amplio y mejora capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Edgar David is 21 years old, married, and completed his 'educación primaria' (compulsory education for children 7-14).  His business is weaving.  He started this business with his parents and has three years experience.  He has the support of his wife who knits.

Edgar David is requesting a loan to buy different colored threads so that he can improve his production of woven products.  In the future he hopes to have more working capital.

loans.use: to buy threads for traditional weaving

loans.name: Magda Maura

texts.es:
La señorita Magda es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazones Unidos”, del distrito de Desaguadero, provincia de Chucuito y departamento de Puno, tiene 50 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos.  Cuenta con estudios de educación superior.
La señora trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace ocho años, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que invirtió en su negocio de venta de golosinas, abarrotes en general al por mayor y menor.
Con este préstamo de  S/. 3000.00 nuevos soles comprará golosinas, tortas, jugos, chocolates, etc. En el negocio le ayuda su mamá.
Su sueño para el futuro es crecer en el negocio y poner una distribuidora de mercadería de todo tipo.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es el préstamo solidario.
texts.en:
Srta. Magda is a member of the Communal Bank "Corazones Unidos" (United Hearts) which is in the District of Desaguadero in Chucuito Province, Department of Puno. She is 50 years old, single, and has no children. Magda has her higher education.

This woman has worked with Manuela Ramos for eight years. Her first loan was in the amount of 300 PEN and was invested in her business of selling candy and groceries wholesale and at retail.

With this loan of 3000 PEN, Magda will buy candy, cakes, juices, chocolates, and other products. Her mother helps with the business. Her dream for the future is to grow her business and open a distribution center that offers all types of merchandise. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank is the solidarity loan.

loans.use: to buy candy, cakes, juices, chocolates, and other products.

loans.name: Israel

texts.es: Israel de cuarenta y seis años de edad vive junto a sus hijos en casa propia; el posee una venta de calzado ortopédico en el lugar de su residencia, con el que ayuda a corregir la pisada del pie o cuando alguna persona tiene algún impedimento, vende para niños y adultos, se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente, pues los zapatos que elabora son de material de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; Israel es un hombre entusiasta y muy honrado dispuesto siempre a superarse, piensa que los optimistas reciben el mayor de los éxitos, el espera ver crecer su negocio, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar una maquina nueva de coser, cuero etc. Israel tiene la confianza que así logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Israel is 46 years old, and lives with his children in his own home.  He has a business selling orthopedic shoes that he runs out of his home.  The shoes helps people to correct their gait, or people with some kind of disability.  He sells shoes for both children and adults.  He has gained many customers recently, as the shoes that he makes are of top quality and are at affordable prices, plus his service is unmatched.

Israel is an enthusiastic and very upright man, who is always ready to excel.  He believes that optimists get most profits, and he hopes to see his business grow.  It is for this reason that his is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL, which will allow him to purchase a new sewing machine, leather, etc.

Israel has confidence that in this way he will be able to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine and leather.

loans.name: Meriana

texts.en:
Meriana is a 54-year-old lady who is married to John, a 54-year-old man. They are blessed with four children: Melianus, 30; Belinda, 28 and married; Apri, 26 and working; Sabrina, attending University.

Meriana runs a business selling fried bananas, pastry, and fried tofu. She has been running the business since 2009. Meriana is grateful for the income generated, which enables her to assist her husband in covering their daily needs. 

Unfortunately, Meriana has some competitors who run the same business. To overcome her problem, Meriana was thinking of producing more cakes and tarts. In order to implement her plan, Meriana submitted a loan application to TLM and requested a loan of IDR 4,500,000. She would like to spend the loan on some supporting equipment such as an oven, a mixer and a blender, and cake ingredients such as wheat flour, margarine, eggs, etc.

loans.use: to purchase equipment such as an oven, a mixer, a blender and cake ingredients such as wheat flour, margarine, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Jovelyn

texts.en:
Jovelyn is a married woman with five children. Jovelyn is 42 years old, residing at Pan-ay Diot, Tudela, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. 

Jovelyn owns farm land, planting and harvesting root crops for sale to earn a living, and she's been 10 years in this business. Each month, she earns 9,000 doing this type of business. 

She requested a loan of 10,700 PHP to purchase fertilizers and additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. 

Jovelyn has been a member of GDMPC for a year. In the future, Jovelyn wants to make improvements to her house and to complete the studies of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Aïssata

texts.fr: Aïssata est une femme faisait de l'import - export dans les pays limitrophes. Mais à cause de maladies fréquentes, elle a décidé d'arrêter ses voyages pour d'ouvrir une boutique de vente de produits cosmétiques à domicile. Ainsi depuis 5 ans, elle vend des tissus, des chaussures et plusieurs produits cosmétiques. Cette activité lui permet d'appuyer son mari dans la prise en charge des dépenses d'entretien de la famille. Elle paie aussi les frais de scolarité de ses trois enfants qui vont à l'école. Elle est sociétaire de l'UIMCEC oû elle a déjà payé deux crédits de 200000 et 150000 f. Afin d'augmenter son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un nouveau pret de  200000 pour acheter des lait de beauté et des mèches . Elle ambitionne d'agrandir sa boutique.
texts.en:
Aïssata is a woman who used to be involved in importing and exporting with bordering countries. But due to frequent illness, she decided to put an end to her trips and instead open a cosmetics shop in her home.

For five years now, she has been selling fabric, shoes, and several types of cosmetics. This business allows her to support her husband in covering their family expenses. She also pays for the education of her three children, who currently attend school. She is a member of the UIMCEC, where she has already paid back two loans of 200,000 and 150,000 f.

In order to expand her business, she is asking for a new loan of 200,000 to buy beauty lotion and hairpieces. She is striving to enlarge her shop.

loans.use: to buy beauty lotion and hairpieces

loans.name: Norlita

texts.en:
Norlita is 58 years old and married.

Norlita is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. 

Norlita requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Norlita has been farming rice for 10 years now, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Norlita would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Mercedita

texts.en:
Mercedita is 45 years old and a widow with one child who is in school. Mercedita works very hard to provide for her child.

Mercedita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 28,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell.

Mercedita has been in this business for 22 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, noodles, snack foods, soft drinks, eggs, etc. 

In the future Mercedita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more stocks to sell.

loans.name: Yvonne Giselle

texts.en:
Yvonne is a 39-year-old married woman with three children, age 6, 11 and 17. 

Yvonne has had a fishing business for eight years. She and her husband work together to provide for their family and send their children to school. Yvonne's husband operates their fishing boat and Yvonne sells his catch at the market. According to Yvonne, their business earns them 10,000 PHP per month.

Yvonne is requesting a loan of 12,000 PHP from CEVI to purchase ten bundles fishing nets, ten kilos of lead, ten kilos of nylon and five packs of floaters. Yvonne hopes that this loan will help improve their business.

loans.use: to purchase ten bundles fishing nets, ten kilos of lead, ten kilos of nylon and five packs of floaters.

loans.name: Vat

texts.en:
Vat is a 43-year-old married man who lives with his wife and four single children, while his oldest child is already married and lives independently in Ang Snoul district. Vat is the main income provider in the family. He works in the construction field, making approximately $5.00 per day. His spouse helps him earn income by working as a garment factory worker. 

Presently Vat is building a fence to protect his house, yet he has inadequate capital to buy added materials like wooden strips and posts. Therefore, he decided to request a loan from Kiva, through HKL, to pay for that. He hopes to have his construction finished early with the given funds.

loans.use: to buy wooden strips and posts to build fence.

loans.name: Reniery De Jesus

texts.es: El  Señor  Reniery, vive en la ciudad de Choluteca, es soltero,  vive con su mama y hermanos, desde hace ocho años se dedica a la compra y venta de Semilla de Marañón,  esta es una fruta que se cosecha en esta zona y la semilla es vendida individualmente como un bocadillo, realiza las compras a productores mayoristas para luego venderlas a sus clientes quienes se encargan de procesarla y venderla por menor, este es un producto que tiene bastante venta por ser muy rico y preferido en cualquier parte del país, este negocio le genera ingresos para poder mantener a sus hermanos ya que todavía están estudiando. Esta solicitando crédito por valor de L. 7,000.00 para poder comprar mas producto y obtener precios mas bajos para una mayor utilidad.
texts.en:
Reniery lives in the city of Choluteca.  He is single, and he lives with his mother and his siblings.

For eight years he has been buying and selling "Semilla de Marañón" (cashew nuts).  This is a fruit that is harvested in this zone, and it is sold individually as a snack.

He makes his purchases from wholesale producers, and he later sells them to his customers who process and sell them for retail prices.  This is a product that has quite a lot of sales because it is delicious and in demand all over the country.

This business generates income for him to be able to support his siblings because they are still in school.

He is requesting a loan for 7,000 lempiras to be able to buy more product at lower prices in order to get a greater profit.

loans.use: to buy cashew nuts for his business.

loans.name: Imas Jaya Group

texts.en:
Mirna is 26 years old, married and together with her husband, she has one marvelous child who is attending play group. 

She is a hardworking and enterprising person. She owns a small grocery store and says that she has been doing this for more 15 years, Thanks to the time she has been in this business, she already has a well-established clientele, and this has helped her support her family and give them everything they need for a better life. 

She is applying for the loan to buy drinks, food products, and other basic household items with which she will be able to stock her store and have merchandise to offer her customers. 

She is grateful to VisionFund Indonesia and Kiva for the opportunity she is receiving. In the future, she wants to expand her business and have enough savings to send her child to a better education. 

The other group members will use their loans to improve their businesses such as selling goods on credit and selling snacks.

loans.use: to pay for more snacks, rice, eggs, sugar, candy, etc., to sell.

loans.name: Usman Harun Group

texts.en:
Agustina is 43 years old, married and the mother of two children. 

She lives together with her husband and children in a simple home in the Kebon Pala area. She is a hardworking and enterprising person. 

Three years ago, she started her business selling cookies and cake and also receiving orders for cookies and cake. Her business is going well and has brought her much support because she’s been able to manage her household expenses. 

She requested the loan to buy an oven to bake the cookies and also to buy the ingredients that she uses to make the cookies, such as flour, sugar, butter, eggs and chocolate. 

In the future, she wants to expand her business and renovate her house. 

The other group members will use the loan to improve their businesses such as selling snacks and selling goods on credit.

loans.use: to pay for supplies such as flour, sugar, butter, eggs, and chocolate and also an oven to bake cookies.

loans.name: Shell Nopar Group

texts.en:
Titin is a 43-year-old married woman. She lives with her husband and three children. Their both cooperate together to meet their family's expenses. 

Wanting a better life, she opened a small general store in front of her house two years ago. So far, her business is stable but business has not increased. That is why she requested the loan to renovate her store by adding more light and lamps and making it more attractive so many customers will come and visit her store. 

She is very grateful to VisionFund Indonesia and Kiva lenders because thanks to their support she will be able to expand her business a little further. In the future she wants to open a new branch and do a small expansion. 

The other group members will use their loans to improve their businesses such as selling homemade food and selling coffee and soft drinks.

loans.use: to pay for renovation for her store.

loans.name: Seng

texts.en:
Seng is a married woman who has four children. She is now 46 years old and resides in the Prey Chor district of Kompong Cham province, Cambodia. Seng has a farm on which she plants and harvests rice to earn a living. She has been in this business for 17 years. However, she always has her husband help her manage the farm maintenance. Each day, she is able to earn $2.00 from doing this work. 

She requested a loan of 1,400,000 Riel (KHR) to pay for her nephew's Korean preparation course. He wants to pass the exam and work as a laborer in Korea. This is  of Seng's  third loan with HKL. She has been an honest client of our firm for many years and she already paid off her previous loans punctually. In the future, Seng wants to make improvements to her house and the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to pay for her nephew's Korean preparation course

loans.name: Elda

texts.en:
Elda is married and has two children. She is 42 and lives in Labo, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental, in the Philippines. 

To earn a living Elda provides transportation services to the local community. She has been doing this for six years and every month earns 8,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) from this work. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase materials for barbecue grilling as an additional business. 

In 2001 Elda became a member of GDMPC. In the future, Elda hopes to finish the education of her children and to gain a second income from this business.

loans.use: to purchase materials for barbecue grilling as additional business

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is a farmer in the Kitale area of Western Kenya, where she resides with her family of five children. Her children are between 17 and 7 years old and are all in school. 

She has been in farming for 16 years and currently employs two farmhands. Her farm produces maize, eggs and tomatoes which all go to the local market. She gets additional income from her employment with the government. 

Mwanamisi has requested a loan of 100,000 Kenyan Shillings (KES) from Juhudi Kilimo to boost her farming by constructing a dairy unit, to prepare for a venture into dairy farming, and by buying more poultry for her poultry business. She hopes to be a major supplier of poultry in the area. 

She laments the cost of animal feeds and disease management.

loans.use: To buy poultry birds and construct a dairy unit

loans.name: Andresa

texts.en:
Andresa, a 48-year-old married mother of eight children, lives in Trinidad, Bohol where her husband works as a carpenter. Andresa buys and sells fruits and vegetables in her community, and although she does not earn much, she is able to help buy her family's basic needs.

Andresa, who works hard to improve her income and sustain her family, is requesting a loan of 5000 PHP to purchase more products to sell such as vegetables and bananas. She hopes for her business to improve and for her children to finish college and have bright futures.

loans.use: to purchase more products to sell such as vegetables and bananas.

loans.name: Khalil

texts.en:
Khalil is a 32-year-old Lebanese man who lives with his wife and only child, a student. Since his family depends on him and needs his support, Khalil works nonstop on their behalf. He also cooperates with his wife who works in a travel agency.

Khalil, who opened his own clothing shop in 2008 and has gained a fair number of customers, is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to enlarge his shop by adding new and diverse clothing designs to it. He notes that this loan will allow him to target new and more customers. In the future, he plans to open an accessories area in his shop.

loans.use: to enlarge his shop by adding new and diverse clothing designs to it.

loans.name: Maria Nicolasa

texts.es: Maria Nicolasa tiene 47 años de edad, la actividad a la que se dedica la emprendedora es a una pulpería ya tiene años de experiencia en el negocio, ella tiene tres hijos pero no están a su cargo ya que son mayores pero la apoyan económicamente. Esta cliente está solicitando financiamiento para realizarle a su vivienda algunas mejoras lo cual con el crédito comprara perlines, zinc, cemento y otros materiales de construcción.
texts.en:
Maria Nicolasa is 47 years old. This entrepreneur has a grocery business and has gained years of experience. She has three children, but they are no longer under her care since they are grown. However, they support her financially.

This client is requesting financing so that she can complete a few improvements to her home. With this loan, she will buy crossbeams, zinc, cement, and other construction materials.

loans.use: to buy crossbeams, zinc, cement, and other construction materials.

loans.name: Timoteo

texts.en:
Timoteo is a married man from San Miguel, Bohol. He has six children, with the oldest child being 14 and the youngest only 15 days.

Timoteo buys and sells coconut shells and charcoal to his community. He has had this business for eight years. Timoteo works hard to improve his income and provide for all his family's needs. He said he is happy to have gained access to CEVI's financial service. He is planning to use his loan to buy more coconut shells and charcoal to sell. Timoteo hopes for this loan to help grow his business.

loans.use: to buy more coconut shells and charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
Paulina, se dedica a la venta de fruta y su esposo trabaja como albañil.
El crédito lo necesita para la compra de cemento, estuco y ladrillo para la refacción de su casa, para dar más comodidad y seguridad a su familia.
Paulina, es casada y tiene tres hijos con los cuales vive en la zona Villa Ingenio en la ciudad de El Alto.
Es la primera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y la primera vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en:
Paulina works selling fruit, and her husband works in construction.

She needs the loan to purchase cement, plaster, and bricks for repairs to her home which will provide better comfort and security for her family.

Paulina is married with three children.  She lives with them in the Villa Ingenio neighborhood of the city of El Alto.

This is her first time working with IMPRO and her first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase cement, plaster and bricks for repairing her home.

loans.name: Yessica Ludvilla

texts.es: Yessica Ludvilla de treinta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una tortillería en el lugar de su residencia últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues vende las tortillas más ricas y calientitas del lugar hechas con material de primera calidad y a precio accesible al consumidor, además es el servicio más rápido de la zona; Yessica es una mujer muy trabajadora con muchas ganas de superarse, quiere ver crecer su negocio y mantenerse al frente de su competencia, piensa que solo con la constancia, dedicación y el amor que le pone a su labor lo logrará, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, gas propano etc. Yessica Ludvilla tiene la esperanza que de esta forma podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Yessica Ludvilla is 32 years old.  She lives with her life companion and children in their own home. She runs a tortilla business out of her home.  Recently she had gained many customers because she sells tortillas that are really delicious and hot, and which are made from top quality ingredients and sold at affordable prices.  She also provided the quickest service in the neighborhood.

Yessica is a very hard working woman with great desire to excel.  She wants to see her business grow, and to keep it ahead of her competition.  She believes that she will succeed only with steadiness, dedication and the love that she brings to her work. It is for this reason that she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to purchase corn at wholesale, propane gas, etc.

Yessica Ludvilla has hope that through this she will be able to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase corn at wholesale and propane gas.

loans.name: Ishmail

texts.en:
Ishmail, a farmer in Kitale, Western Kenya for 17 years, is 48 years old, married, and the father of five children between 22 and 6 years of age, all in school. His farm produces milk, fish, poultry and horticultural products and employs one farmhand.

Ishmail has requested a loan of 52,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. He is optimistic that he will be able to improve his farming income and have enough income to expand his farming acreage by buying more land as well as improve the quality of dairy breeds he keeps.

He mentions animal diseases and high input costs as the major challenges in farming. He remains grateful, however, to Juhudi Kilimo for the loan services.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: John Maina

texts.en:
John is applying for his second loan term with KADET LTD after repaying the previous loan successfully. John will use the loan to buy more sacks of maize, beans and dry peas for sale. 

With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to open a butchery in the future.

loans.use: to buy sacks of maize, beans and dry peas for sale.

loans.name: Henry

texts.en:
Henry is a 26-year-old businessman. He is married to Mary, a business lady. They are blessed with one child. Henry has been in a quarry mining business for the past year, with the monthly income of 9,000 KES which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his first loan term with KADET LTD, after being introduced by a KADET staff member. Henry will use the loan to buy quarry equipment. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his child. His hopes and dreams are to buy a quarry ground.

loans.use: to buy quarry equipment

loans.name: Robinson

texts.en:
Robinson is a 36-year-old, general shop owner in Mombasa. He is married and a father of one child. He has been running this business for the past six years with great success.

This marks Robinson’s second business loan from KADET LTD. He plans to purchase more bicycle pedals, bicycle tires and motorcycle spare parts for sale. 

He will use the anticipated profits to open another shop. He hopes to excel in the business and have a happy family.

loans.use: to purchase more bicycle pedals, bicycle tires and motorcycle spare parts

loans.name: Geoffrey

texts.en:
Geoffrey is a resident and a farmer in Kitale, where he carries out farming and lives with his family of three children, ages 9 and 3 years with the last born only three months ago. Geoffrey is 32 and has been in farming for over 10 years. He runs a retail shop in the local market for additional income. His farm currently produces maize, tomatoes and vegetables.

Geoffrey has requested a loan of 90,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to help him venture into poultry farming. He says he will buy poultry birds for 30,000 KES and construct a poultry housing unit for 60,000 KES. He says the income from farming will help him improve his family living standards. 

He plans to buy a van for a transport business in the future. He laments of poor roads which makes transportation costly to farmers.

loans.use: to buy poultry birds and construct a poultry housing unit

loans.name: Kifah

texts.en:
Kifah is a 42-year-old Lebanese woman. She’s widowed, living with her only child who is still studying. She strives to work really hard in order to fulfill their needs and be able to pay her child’s educational fees. Kifah has been working making floral arrangements for events since 2007. She also sells ribbons, gift’s wraps and many related items.  

Today, she’s asking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to buy additional flowers for her shop in addition to some related accessories. This will certainly increase the number of customers asking for her products and therefore boost her revenues. In the future, she plans to work in decorating and organizing all kinds of events.

loans.use: to buy additional flowers for her shop in addition to some related accessories

loans.name: Jhon Karol

texts.es:
Jhon tiene 34 años de edad, vive con sus padres en la ciudad de Imperial, ciudad que se caracteriza por su agricultura, así como también por la generosidad de sus pobladores, Jhon es muy entusiasta y trabajador  y sobre todo un hijo amoroso, ya que con los ingresos de su trabajo el apoya a sus padres con los gastos del hogar ya que ellos tienen 70 años y a pesar de que todavía tienen muchas fuerzas necesitan de su colaboración.

Desde hace cuatro años Jhon se dedica a su negocio de compra y venta de sacos, el compra sacos pequeños para luego convertirlos en sacos más grandes y ofrecerlos en el mercado de su barrio, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque le gusta su gusta su trabajo y sobre todo porque lo motiva el ayudar a sus padres que tanto lo han apoyado.

Jhon está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar un máquina de coser nueva ya que la maquina que tiene actualmente está muy viejita, con esta mejora le permitirá coser de manera más rápida los sacos, así seguirá luchando para salir adelante y cumplir su gran sueño:” Tener mas máquinas de coser y poder dar trabajo a otras personas en su barrio”.
texts.en:
Jhon, age 34, lives with his parents in the city of Imperial.  The city is known for its agriculture and for the generosity of its people.  Jhon is very enthusiastic and hard-working.  Above all, he is a loving son.  He uses his work income to support his parents with the household expenses.  They are 70 years old.  In spite of the fact that they still have a lot of energy, they need his contribution.

Jhon has been buying and selling bags for four years.  He buys small bags and later turns them into larges bags.  He sells them at the market in his neighborhood.  He believes that his business is going well for him because he likes his work.  Above all else, it is going well because he is motivated to help his parents who have supported him so much.

Jhon is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help they have given him he will be able to buy a new sewing machine.  The one he has now is very old.  This new one will allow him to sew the bags more quickly.  That way he will continue in his struggle to get ahead and fulfill his big dream:  To have more sewing machines and to be able to give work to other people in his neighborhood.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a 52-year-old married woman with seven children. Her children are aged between 7 and 30 years old.

Elizabeth is in the business of rice farming. She and her husband till their land to plant rice crops to sell. Elizabeth also makes ice "buko" (coconut ice popsicles) that she sells to her community. She is requesting a loan of 18,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers, seeds and ingredients to make ice "buko". Elizabeth plans to expand her businesses in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, seeds and ingredients to make ice "buko"

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
Virginia, tiene 41 años de edad, soltera, vive junto con sus padres en la aladea la Fragua, Morazán Yoro.
Ella es una persona muy trabajadora quien ha crecido con sus padres realizando actividades agrícolas, hace 10 años que se dedica a la producción y venta de maíz, ya tiene sus propias parcelas. A esta actividad le dedica tres horas diarias.
Esta solicitando un préstamo de 3,000.00 Lempiras para comprar abono para darle un mejor mantenimiento al cultivo del maíz y sacar buenas cosechas.
Su plan es mejorar su producción y con las ganancias tener un mejor nivel de vida.

Ella pertenece al  Banco Comunal la Fragua que está conformado  por  14 miembros que residen en la misma comunidad y se dedican a la agricultura.
texts.en:
Virginia is 41 years old, single, and lives with her parents in La Fragua, Morazán Yoro. She is a very hardworking person who engages in farming activities with her parents. Virginia has been producing and selling corn for 10 years and has her own land. She engages in this activity three hours a day.

Virginia is requesting a loan of 3,000 HNL in order to buy compost that will maintain her corn crop so that she can have a good harvest. Her plans are to improve her production and use her earnings to have a better standard of living. She belongs to the Communal Bank "La Fragua" (The Forge) which consists of 14 members who reside in the same community and engage in agriculture.

loans.use: to buy compost for her corn crop.

loans.name: Sandra Lisseth

texts.es: Sandra Lisseth de veintinueve años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y su hijo. Ella posee una venta de comida rápida, papas, hotdog, tortas, hamburguesa entre otros, últimamente se ha hecho de más clientela y ha aumentado la demanda para el negocio, pues la gente está satisfecha con lo que les ofrecen; comida hecha con material de excelente calidad y precios realmente accesible; Sandra es una mujer honrada y muy trabajadora siempre se mantiene al frente de su competencia, tiene grandes metas para el futuro y está dispuesta a cumplirlos, piensa  que su pan de cada día será el vivir noblemente sus sueños, es así como le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar papas, pan, carne, verduras etc. Sandra Lisseth tiene fe que así podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Sandra Lisseth, aged 29, lives with her life partner and her son. She sells fast food, potatoes, hot dogs, pies, hamburgers, etc. Recently she got more customers and a higher demand for her products, because people like what she has on offer: food prepared with excellent ingredients at a really affordable price. Sandra is an honest and hard-working woman and is always ahead of her competitors. She has great goals for the future and is willing to pursue them, praying for her daily bread which will be to nobly live her dreams. This is why she came to the microfinance institution Apoyo Integral and applied for a loan to buy potatoes, bread, meat, vegetables, etc. Sandra Lisseth believes that she can thus help her family to live life to the full.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, bread, meat and vegetables.

loans.name: Youssef

texts.en:
Youssef is a 43-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and five children. One of them is working and the others are still attending school.  He’s is the one taking care of his family and covering their heavy life expenses. 

Youssef started his own work in 1987. He has been working as a car mechanic in his own garage and has a fair number of customers asking for his services. In parallel, he has been working in car trading for more than ten years. 

Today, he’s looking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to buy new mechanic's tools for his business in order to respond rapidly to his clients’ problems and therefore improve his work. He believes that acting properly is really essential to attract more and added customers. In the future, he plans to open his own car showroom.

loans.use: to buy new mechanic's tools for his business

loans.name: Taurng

texts.en:
Taurng is a 38-year-old married woman who has been living in Kompong Cham province, her hometown. She has had a cultivating business. She grows a couple of crops like potatoes, beans and especially rice. To manage this work efficiently, Taurng has her spouse and several children who are involved with the business alongside her. She has been in this business for more than 13 years, thus she has obtained good experience from it. She presently lives with three single children, while the other two are already married and live separately.

Taurng would like to get a loan from Kiva lenders to rent a piece of farmland, which is located near the river to grow dry-season rice. With a segment of this amount, she will buy rice seed to put in her soil. This loan enables Taurng to get her business developed in the coming days.  Her wish is to provide her children a good education.

loans.use: to rent a piece of farmland.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is 41 years old and widowed. She has five children whom she supports alone. Alice has been in the business for seventeen years and  generates a monthly income of KES 4,000. 

She has borrowed a loan of KES 30,000, and she will be using the loan to increase the stock  of  beans, green grams (lentils), and peas for sale in her grocery shop. Her anticipated profits will be used to pay  school fees for her children.

This is her fourth loan with KADET LTD, after successfully repaying the previous loans. Her dream is to see her children get the best education.

loans.use: Increase stock  of  beans, green grams (lentils), and peas for sale.

loans.name: Miech

texts.en:
Miech is a resident of Kompong Speu province of Cambodia. Her husband is her partner and she has been blessed with five children, all of whom are single and unemployed. On the other hand, besides their classes, Miech’s children always help her manage the maintenance of the rice field. 

Her spouse is in the same business as her and devotes some time to make handmade fishing materials, which are made from bamboo. To better her living, Miech decided to get involved in a buy-and-sell recycled materials business. She goes through her community to collect her things every day, yet her capital has recently run out to invest in this business. 

As of now, Miech is taking out her first cycle loan to use as sufficient capital to buy and collect the recycled things. With the remainder, she will buy raw materials for her husband for making his bamboo products. 

Miech hopes to have a comfortable life one day as she strives to work continually.

loans.use: to buy and collect the recycled things.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth is 25 years old and married with one child. She runs a general store to earn a living. She has been in the business for five years and has employed one person. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for 35,000 Kenya Shillings to buy beans, maize and tomatoes to sell.

loans.use: To buy beans, maize and tomatoes to sell

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
Lucia, trabaja como vendedora en una tienda de cerámicas y también se dedica al cultivo de flores.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de semillas ya que con este negocio de cultivo de flores obtiene ingresos extras para mantener a su familia.
Lucia, es casada y tiene cuatro hijos con los cuales vive en la zona Villa Cooperativa en la ciudad de EL Alto.
Es la primera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en: Lucia works as a saleswoman in a ceramics shop and also grows flowers.  She needs the loan to buy seeds because her flower business produces extra income to support her family.  Lucia is married and has four children living with her in the city of El Alto's Villa Cooperativa zone.  This is the first time she's worked with IMPRO and first time with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy flower seeds.

loans.name: Arcela

texts.es: Arcela de cuarenta y siete años de edad vive junto a su familia; ella posee una tienda en el lugar de su residencia donde vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, frijoles, leche, pan entre otros, se ha hecho de más clientela últimamente, pues todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y lo vende a precios bajos además el servicio es único; Arcela es una mujer  muy activa siempre está dispuesta  a cumplir sus objetivos;  su más grande sueño hacer crecer su negocio y sabe que solo con esfuerzo y labor constante podrá lograrlo es por eso que le solicita  a  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar mayor cantidad demandada por sus clientes de granos básicos, golosinas, bebidas, pan, jabón.  Arcela tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad económica.
texts.en:
Arcela is 47 years old and lives with her family. She has a store in her residence where she sells staples such as rice, beans, milk and bread, among other items.  She has had more customers recently since everything she sells is of very good quality, her prices are low and her service is first-rate.

Arcela is a very active woman and is always ready to fulfill her objectives. Her biggest dream is to expand her business and she knows that she will be able to do so only with constant effort and work. Consequently she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that will enable her to purchase in bulk the basic grains, candy, drinks, bread and soap that her customers demand. She is confident that in this way she will be able to provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, candy, drinks, bread and soap.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 39 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children. 
Rosalinda has a shop that sells fruit & non-fruit seedlings like mahogany & mango trees. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy fertilizers for fruit & non-fruit seedlings.

Rosalinda has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Rosalinda hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for fruit & non-fruit seedlings

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina is 54 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has eight children. 

Marina has a shop that sells fish like sardines, mackerel & trout per kilogram. She has had this business for 15 years. She requested a loan of 14,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) to buy stocks of fish for resale. 

Marina has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Marina hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of fish for resale

loans.name: Tom Mokua  Ochanda

texts.en: Tom is 39 years old and runs a beauty salon to earn a living. He has been in the business for 3 years and has employed one person. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his business and hopes to own a big salon in the future. He has applied for 100,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a hair drier, a hair blow dry machine and hair chemicals.

loans.use: To buy hair drier, a hair blow dry machine and hair chemicals

loans.name: Yin

texts.en:
Yin is a 33 year-old married woman who has been living in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. She has been there for ages with a farming business. She grows rice and potatoes. She has a common-law relationship with her husband and has been blessed with a two children who are attending a public state school. Her spouse is supportive and always helps Yin manage all farming maintenance. 

Yin is applying for a loan from HKL and Kiva to pay for the process of planting her potato crops in a new cycle of the season. She tells us that this project will bring her a good harvest after 4-5 months. From the generated income, she intends to save a part of it to further develop her existing business and support her children’s education. She wants them to become junior or senior high school teachers.

loans.use: pay for the process of planting her potato crops.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary wants a loan to buy charcoal for resale. She lives in Masindi, Uganda and is charged with the responsibility of taking care of her two children. Her family dream is to educate her children and live a better life. She desires to expand her business into new areas.

loans.use: to buy charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Robert

texts.es:
Robert, trabaja como chofer propietario dentro de un sindicato en la ciudad de La Paz.
El crédito lo requiere para el mantenimiento del vehiculo ya que es su única fuente de trabajo para mantener a su familia.
Robert, es soltero y tiene dos hijos vive en la casa de su hermana en la zona Llojeta la misma ubicada en la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la tercera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y la segunda vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en: Robert works as a owner/driver in one of the city of La Paz's syndicates.  He needs the loan to service his vehicle since it's his only source of work to support his family.  Robert is single and has two children.  He lives in his sister's house in the city of La Paz's Llojeta Zone.  This is the third time he's worked with IMPRO and second with KIVA.

loans.use: to pay to service his vehicle.

loans.name: Nieves

texts.es:
La señora Nieves, trabaja como empleada dentro de una empresa privada que se dedica a la venta de servicios. Su esposo vive en el exterior y le envía algo de dinero cada mes para completar los ingresos necesarios para sostener a ella y sus dos hijos.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de útiles escolares de sus hijos, pues las clases ya han comenzado.
Nieves es divorciada y tiene dos hijos con los cuales vive en una casa alquilada en la zona de Villa Fátima la misma ubicada en la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la primera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la primera junto a KIVA.
texts.en: Nieves works as an employee in a private firm that sells services.  Her husband lives abroad and sends her a bit of money each month to help complete the necessary income to support her and her two children.  She needs the loan to buy school supplies for her children since classes have started.  Nieves is divorced and has two childen she lives with in a rented house located in the city of La Paz's Villa Fátima zone.  This is thei first time she's worked with IMPRO and first with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy school supplies for her two children.

loans.name: Rosa Flor

texts.es:
Rosa Flor tiene 21 años de edad es soltera tiene 1 hijo, vive con los padres y con el hijo de 1 año de edad en Guaranda provincia Bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda.

Rosa se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de lechuga, coliflor, brócoli, zanahoria, cebolla.
 
Solicita el crédito para comprar las semillas, plantas de cebolla, lechuga, fertilizantes, urea. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda cada 15 días.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá  comprar los insumos sin ningún problema. El sueño es poder comprar un vehículo. En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar, ver televisión.
texts.en:
Rosa Flor is 21 years old, single, and has one child.  She lives with her parents and her 1-year-old son in Guaranda, in Bolívar province.

The Mushuc Yuyay community bank is located 30 minutes from our offices.  It has 10 members who are from Quivillungo community, in Guaranda.

Rosa is a farmer who grows lettuce, cauliflower, broccoli, carrots and onions.  She is requesting this loan to buy seeds, onion plants, lettuce, fertilizers and urea.  She makes her purchases and sales in Guaranda every two weeks.  

With the help of this loan, Rosa will be able to buy the supplies she needs without any problems.  Her dream is to buy a vehicle.  In her spare time, she enjoys relaxing and watching the television.

loans.use: to buy seeds, onion plants, lettuce, fertilizers and urea

loans.name: Antonio

texts.en:
Antonio is 62 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is widowed and has 3 children. 
Antonio has a shop that sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. He has had this business for 10 years. He requested a loan of 12,000 to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell.
Antonio has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Antonio hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Genevieve

texts.en:
Genevieve  is 31 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is widowed and has 5 children. 
Genevieve  has a shop that sells fruit & non-fruit seedlings, like mahogany & mango trees. She has had this business for 2 years. She requested a loan for 11,000 to buy fertilizers for the fruit & non-fruit seedlings.
Genevieve has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Genevieve hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for the fruit & non-fruit seedlings

loans.name: Annet

texts.en: Annet is a hardworking woman living in Masindi, Uganda. She has been operating a retail shop and this has enabled her to take care of her children. She faces the challenges of price fluctuations and inflation and her dream is to have a wholesale shop. Annet needs the loan to buy soap and sugar for resale.

loans.use: to buy soap and sugar for resale.

loans.name: John Kioko Katiso

texts.en: John is 56 years old, married, and has eight children. He runs a butcher shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for 15 years and has employed six people. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to educate his children and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 70,000 KES to buy two bulls for slaughter.

loans.use: To buy two bulls for slaughter

loans.name: Silvia

texts.en: Silvia is 28 years old, married, and has two children. She lives in Hoima, Uganda. She has been farming for six years. With the proceeds she has been able to provide for the basic needs of her children. She faces a challenge of price fluctuations and inadequate capital. Her family goal is to educate her children, and her business goal is to expand her business to new markets and hire employees. Silvia needs the loan to buy rice and soybeans for planting.

loans.use: to buy rice and soybeans for planting.

loans.name: Rudo's Group

texts.en: This is 47-year-old Rudo from Harare, the capital of Zimbabwe. She is married and has five children, one of whom attends school. Rudo runs a retail business selling clothes. The business has been in operation for 10 years. She says the main challenge for her business is a dilapidated market place. Rudo has requested a loan to buy more clothes for resale. With the extra income generated as a result of this loan, she will be able to enhance her family's welfare. In the future Rudo is planning to expand and own a clothing shop in the City Centre.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale

loans.name: Peterson Mugo

texts.en:
Peterson is applying for his fourth loan with KADET Ltd. after repaying the previous loans successfully. He will use the loan to hire laborers to work on the farm and buy seedlings for planting.  

With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to buy a lorry for transporting the products to different markets.

loans.use: To hire laborers to work on the farm, and to buy seedlings for planting.

loans.name: Avelino

texts.es:
Avelino tiene 37 años de edad es casado tiene 5 hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 12, 8, 6, 4 y 1 año de edad en Guaranda Provincia de bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda

Avelino se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de hortalizas, coles, tomate, babacos, lechuga,  zanahoria, además se dedica a la cría de animales como cerdos, pollos, y ganados.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas de calidad, abonos, líquidos para las plagas. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los abonos y fertilizantes.

Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda cada 15 días. El sueño es poder tener un negocio propio, casa ,  vehículo , culminar los estudios y graduarse.

En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar, dedicar tiempo a los hijos y practicar deporte.
texts.en:
Avelino is 37 years old and married with five children. He lives with his wife and children, ages 12,8, 6,4 and 1, in Guaranda, in Bolivar province.

The Mushuc Yuyay Communal Bank is located 30 minutes from the office and is made up of 10 members from Quivillungo community, belonging to the town of Guaranda.

Avelino farms vegetables, cabbage, tomatoes, babacos (mountain papayas), lettuce and carrots and also raises animals such as pigs, chickens and cattle. He is applying for a loan to buy high quality seeds, compost, and pest control liquids. With the help of the loan he will be able to purchase compost and fertilizer.

Avelino buys and sells in Guaranda every 15 days. His dream is to own his own business, house and vehicle and to finish his studies and graduate. In his free time he enjoys resting, spending time with his children and playing sports.

loans.use: to purchase high quality seeds, fertilizer and pest control liquids.

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es:
Sergio tiene 30 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 10 y 7 años de edad en  Guaranda Provincia de bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda.

Sergio se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de mora, lechugas cebolla, zanahoria además cría pollos y cerdos. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda.

Solicita el crédito para poder comprar semillas, plantas de cebollas, brócoli, abonos, líquidos, fertilizantes. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar la magnitud de la siembra.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y el mal clima. El sueño es poder comprar un vehículo y una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar.
texts.en:
Sergio, 30, is married and has two children; he lives with his wife and children who are 10 and 7 years old in Guaranda, Bolívar Province.

The “Mushuc Yuyay” communal bank is located thirty minutes from the office and it has ten members in the community of Quivillungo belonging to Guaranda.

Sergio is a farmer.  He grows blackberries, lettuce, onions and lettuce.  He also raises chicks and pigs.  His purchases and his sales take place in Guaranda.

He is requesting the loan to be able to buy seeds, onion plants, broccoli, manure, liquids and fertilizers.  With help from the loan he will be able to expand the size of his plantings.

He faces challenges like infestations and poor weather.  His dream is to be able to buy a vehicle and a house.  In his free time he likes to rest.

loans.use: to buy seeds, onion plants, broccoli, manure, liquids and fertilizer.

loans.name: Maria Aurora

texts.es:
María Aurora tiene 62 años de edad es viuda tiene una hija, vive con la nieta en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda.

María se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de hortalizas como lechugas, cebolla, brócoli, zanahoria.  

Solicita el crédito para poder  comprar semillas, plantas de cebolla, lechugas, y  fertilizantes, abono orgánico. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda cada 15 días.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar la producción. El sueño es poder comprar un vehículo y una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar y disfrutar de las fiestas
texts.en:
María Aurora, 62, is widowed and has a daughter; she lives with her granddaughter in Guaranda, Bolívar Province.

The “Mushuc Yuyay” communal bank is located thirty minutes from the office and it has ten members in the community of Quivillungo belonging to Guaranda.

María is a farmer; she grows vegetables like lettuce, onions, broccoli and carrots.  

She asks for the loan to be able to buy seeds, onion plants, lettuce, fertilizers and organic manure.  Her purchases and sales take place in Guaranda every fifteen days.

With help from the loan she will be able to increase production. Her dream is to be able to buy a vehicle and a house.  In her free time she likes to rest and enjoy the festivals.

loans.use: to buy seeds, onion plants, lettuce, fertilizer and organic manure.

loans.name: Maria Aida

texts.es:
María Aída tiene 31 años de edad es casada tiene 31 años de edad  tiene 1 hijo, vive con el esposo y con el hijo de 6 años de edad en Guaranda provincia de bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda.

María se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de brócoli, lechuga y mora además cría pollos y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar los insumos, fertilizantes, urea, abonos, balanceado, vitaminas, vacunas, desparacitantes.

Las compras y las ventas los hace en Guaranda cada 15 días.Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y el mal clima.

 El sueño es poder comprar un vehículo para transportar los productos, en el tiempo libre le gusta jugar cartas.
texts.en:
María Aída is 31 years old, married, and has one child.  She lives with her husband and her 6-year-old son in Guaranda, in Bolívar province.

The Mushuc Yuyay community bank is located 30 minutes from our offices.  It has 10 members who are from Quivillungo community, in Guaranda.

María is a farmer who grows broccoli, lettuce and blackberries.  She also raises chickens and pigs.  She is requesting this loan to buy supplies, fertilizers, urea, manure, nutritionally-balanced animal feed, vitamins, vaccines and parasite remedies.  She makes her purchases and sales in Guaranda every two weeks.  The challenges she faces are pests and bad weather.

María's dream is to buy a vehicle for transporting her produce.  In her spare time, she enjoys playing cards.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizers, urea, manure, nutritionally-balanced animal feed, vitamins, vaccines and parasite remedies

loans.name: Rosa Del Carmen

texts.es: Rosa del Carmen de treinta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una venta de ropa y peluches en el lugar de su residencia, vende en variedad vestidos, blusas, pantalones se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles, además el servicio es único; Rosa es una mujer encantadora siempre esta con una sonrisa en el rostro y dispuesta a trabajar duro para superarse a sí misma, piensa que solo obtiene el existo quien en verdad lo desea, ella está segura de lo que quiere es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor y peluches. Rosa del Carmen tiene la confianza que así podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica  una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en: Rosa del Carmen is 34 years old and lives together with her life partner and children in her own home.  She has a business selling clothing and stuffed toys from her home.  She sells a range of dresses, blouses and pants (trousers).  She has a lot of customers because everything she sells is very good quality and she sells her products at affordable prices.  In addition, her service is second-to-none.  Rosa is a lovely woman who always has a smile on her face and is ready to work hard in order to do well.  She believes that only those who truly wish for success will obtain it.  She is certain of what she wants and she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL in order to buy clothing wholesale, and also stuffed toys.  Rosa del Carmen believes that this will enable her to provide her household with financial security and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale, and also stuffed toys

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard is hardworking married father of six children, living in Hioma, Uganda.  He has a bar and lodge business which he has been running for 1 year.  He has high hopes that his business will grow.  He started as a farmer and he saved to start the current business.  He faces a challenge of price fluctuations, and his family goal is to educate his children and expand his business to new markets  Richard needs the loan facility to renovate his residential house.

loans.use: to renovate his residential house.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is 29 years old, married, and has three children living in Hioma, Uganda. He is a teacher and has been teaching for seven years. He also has nursery beds of flowers which he sells to hotels and families that need to beautify thier compounds. He faces a challenge of high taxes and his family goal is to educate his children. Peter intends to use the loan to buy seedlings for his nursery beds.

loans.use: to buy seedlings for his nursery beds.

loans.name: Andrew

texts.en: Andrew is 25 years old and runs a grocery store to earn a living. He has been in the business for three years and has employed one person. He also does dairy farming to earn extra income. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his business and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 20,000 KES to buy potatoes, carrots, onions, and maize to sell.

loans.use: To buy potatoes, carrots, onions, and maize

loans.name: María Monserrate

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal Madres Unidas.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora María, ella tiene 52 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene 5 hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad, 4 de  sus hijos aun viven con ella, dos de ellos son casados y viven con sus familias. Su esposo es comerciante.

Ella es una muy buena esposa y ama de casa  que realiza el crédito para ayudar en el negocio de su esposo, el cual es la fuente ingresos para toda la familia, su esposo se dedica al comercio vende frutas, legumbres y granos, su forma de venta es ambulante él recorre un  mercado en Manta, allí  vende sus productos a las personas que asisten todos los días hasta este lugar para realizar sus compras, trabaja 4 días a la semana y esto lo viene realizando desde hace mas 36 años y gracias a Dios le ha ido muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar legumbres, frutas, frejol y otros granos que vende. Es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que ha recibido de la institución. 

Su sueño es tener una tienda.
texts.en:
The members of the Communal Bank "Madres Unidas" (United Mothers) meet every 15 days in the lowlands of Montecristi, a city that is known for its great diversity of traditional products. For example, the Panama hats that are produced here are known within and outside of the country.

It is in this place that one can meet Sra. María. She is 52 years old, married, and has five children who are already grown. Four of them still live with her. Two of them are married and live with their families. Her husband is a merchant.

María is a wonderful wife and homemaker who is receiving this loan to help with her husband's business, which provides income for their entire family. Her husband is a merchant who sells fruits, legumes, and grains as a street vendor. He travels to a market in Manta where he sells his products. Her husband attends to his customers every day in this place where they make their purchases. He works four days a week and has been in this business for more than 36 years. Thanks to God, he has done very well.

This loan will be used to buy legumes, fruits, beans, and other grains to sell. María is a founding member of her Communal Bank and enjoys the assistance she has received from Fundación ESPOIR. Her dream is to open a store.

loans.use: to buy legumes, fruits, beans, and grains.

loans.name: Maria Manuela

texts.es:
María Manuela  tiene 23 años de edad es casada tiene un hijo, vive con el esposo y con el hijo de 1 año de edad en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda.

María se dedica a la siembra de  lechuga, brócoli, cebolla, además cría animales como pollos y ganado.

Solicita el crédito para poder comprar semillas, fertilizantes, urea, líquidos para la maleza, plantas de cebolla, brócoli.

Las compras y las ventas lo hace en  Guaranda cada 15 días. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar la producción.

El sueño es contar con un vehículo para la familia. En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar y también bailar.
texts.en:
María Manuela, 23, is married and has a son; she lives with her husband and son in Guaranda, Bolívar Province.

The “Mushuc Yuyay” communal bank is located thirty minutes from the office and it has ten members in the community of Quivillungo belonging to Guaranda.

María grows lettuce, broccoli, onions and also raises animals like chicks and cattle.

She asks for the loan to be able to buy seeds, fertilizer, urea, weed killers, onion plants and broccoli.

Her purchases and sales take place in Guaranda every fifteen days.  With help from the loan she will be able to increase production.  Her dream is to have a vehicle for her family.   In her free time she likes to rest and also to dance.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, urea, weed killers, onion plants and broccoli.

loans.name: Maria Rosa

texts.es:
María Rosa tiene 41 años de edad es casada tiene 4 hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda.

María se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas como la lechuga, cebolla, brócoli. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda cada 15 días.

Solicita el crédito para poder comprar los insumos, fertilizantes, líquidos para la maleza, semillas, plantas de lechuga y cebolla.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá poner en marcha la siembra.  El sueño es tener un negocio propio. En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar.
texts.en:
María Rosa, 41, is married and has four children; she lives with her husband and children in Guaranda, Bolívar Province.

The “Mushuc Yuyay” communal bank is located thirty minutes from the office and it has ten members in the community of Quivillungo belonging to Guaranda.

María grows vegetables like lettuce, onions and broccoli.  Her purchases and sales take place in Guaranda every fifteen days.

She asks for the loan to be able to buy supplies, fertilizer, weed killers, seeds, lettuce and onion plants.  With help from the loan she will be able to start planting.  Her dream is to have a business of her own.  In her free time she likes to rest.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizer, weed killers, seeds, onion and lettuce plants.

loans.name: María Esther

texts.es: María Esther de treinta y dos años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella posee un taller de costura en el lugar donde reside, es muy conocida en el lugar pues confecciona las mejores prendas de vestir al gusto del cliente, como pantalones, vestidos,  faldas entre otros, toda la materia prima que utiliza es de muy buena calidad y vende a precios accesibles; María es una mujer muy trabajadora sabe aprovechar las oportunidades que se le presentan, piensa que la motivación nos impulsa a comenzar y el hábito nos permite continuar, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor, hilos etc. María Esther tiene la esperanza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María Esther is 32 years old and lives with her life partner and children in her own home.  She has a sewing workshop in her home and is very well known in her area because she makes the best clothing, such as trousers, dresses and skirts, to her customers' tastes.  All of the raw materials she uses are very good quality and she sells her products at affordable prices.  María is a very hard-working woman who knows how to make the most of opportunities that present themselves.  She thinks that motivation drives us to start working and habit allows us to continue.  She is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy fabric, thread, etc. wholesale.  She hopes that this will enable her to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabric wholesale

loans.name: Yamile Del Socorro

texts.es: Yamile es una mujer muy creativa, ella se dedica a la elaboración de tapetes, utilizando como materias primas los retazos de tela que venden en el mercado a mejores precios; con ello fabrica hermosos detalles, abullonadas colchas que se utilizan como limpiones industriales y son expendidos en el barrio a compradores y distribuidores, detallistas. Ella con su negocio ha apoyado la gestión de bienestar en su hogar, conformado por su cónyuge y una hija de 22 años de edad. Su meta mas adelante es ampliar su negocio, adquiriendo maquinarias que le permitan una mayor tecnificación y con ello ampliaría su mercado e incrementaría sus ingresos y posibilidades de progresar. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará una máquina de coser y retazos en mayor volumen. Su mayor desafío es la competencia y por esto se prepara en la búsqueda de mejores precios comprando en un mayor volumen, como justamente lo hará con su credikiva.
texts.en:
Yamile is a very creative woman.  She makes large sized cleaning rags.  The raw materials that she uses are the fabric scraps that are sold at the market for the best prices.  With the scraps she adds beautiful details and makes them somewhat quilted and puffy.  They are used for industrial cleaning jobs, and they are sold in the neighborhood to buyers, distributors, and retailers.

With her business she has supported the well-being of her household, which is comprised of her husband and her 22 year old daughter.  Her goal for the future is to expand her business and to get machines that will allow her greater modernization.  With this she will widen her market, increase her income, and increase her possibilities to progress.

She is currently requesting a Kiva loan, which is her first with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She will use the loan to buy a sewing machine and a greater volume of fabric scraps.  Her biggest challenge is the competition.  Therefore she prepares by seeking the best prices in a greater volume.  That is exactly what she will do with her Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and fabric scraps.

loans.name: Pedro Fernando

texts.es:
Pedro Fernando tiene 22 años de edad es casado tiene una hija, vive con la esposa y con la hija de 2 años de edad en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda.

Pedro se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de mora, cebolla, y crianza de pollos y ganado.
Solicita El Crédito Para poder comprar los abonos, fertilizantes, semillas, urea. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda cada semana.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son el mal tiempo y la competencia. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los insumos e incrementar la producción. 

El sueño es poder un vehículo para trasportar los productos. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar indor.
texts.en:
Pedro Fernando, 22, is married and has a daughter; he lives with his wife and two year old daughter in Guaranda, Bolívar Province.

The “Mushuc Yuyay” communal bank is located thirty minutes from the office and it has ten members in the community of Quivillungo belonging to Guaranda.

Pedro farms blackberries and onions and raises chicks and cattle.

He asks for the loan to be able to buy manure, fertilizer, seeds and urea.  His purchases and sales take place in Guaranda every week.  The challenges he faces are poor weather and competition.  With help from the loan he will be able to buy supplies and increase production.
