texts.en: Nizomjon is a smart and decent family man. He started his business with animal husbandry and then gradually switched to poultry. He has 2,000 chickens in stock. His son helps him in the business. Nizomjon wants to improve his living conditions and is asking for a loan with this purpose to buy cement and gravel. He plans to build a three room house. Nizomjon hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase of cement and gravel.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.ru: Ахмад добрый и честный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих несовершеннолетних детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 4-х лет Ахмад занимается выращиванием и продажей сельхозпродуктов, имеет богатый опыт. В бизнесе помогают жена и дети. Ахмад запрашивает займ в размере 3500 Сомони для покупки семян и минеральных удобрений. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Ahmad is a kind and honest man. He is married and is raising three underage children. His wife is a homemaker. Ahmad has been cultivating and selling agricultural crops for more than four years. He has a rich experience. His wife and children help him in the business. Ahmad is asking for a loan in the amount of 3,500 somoni to buy seeds and mineral fertilizer. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Maria Amalia

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade de Maputo, Província do mesmo nome, Sul de Moçambique, casada e mãe de 2 filhos todos frequentam a Escola. Fez o nível primário e parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos pais. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.

É negociante há mais de 15 anos, dedica-se a venda de produtos alimentares e tem um rendimento de cerca de 6.000.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).
Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu primeiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 20.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar produtos (óleo, arroz, amendoim, farinha, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende ampliar a sua actividade comercial construindo um estabelecimento para expor os seus produtos, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
She was born in the town of Maputo, province of the same name, southern Mozambique. She's married and has two children, all of which attend school. She went to elementary school and stopped because her parents lacked financial conditions. She lives with her family in a house she owns and does not support anyone else.
She has been a businesswoman for over 15 years. She sells foodstuffs and earns an income of about 6.000mt. She uses it to pay for home expenses and also saves part of it in her bank account.
She has never had loans in other banks. She first heard of Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is her first loan with Hluvuku. It is for 20.000mt, which she intends to use to purchase goods (oil, rice, peanuts, flour, etc.) in order to increase the volume of her merchandise.
She pledges to make her repayments as scheduled. In the future, she intends to expand her business by building a venue where she can display her products. For that she plans to request other loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to purchase oil, rice, nuts, flour, etc., for her food stall.

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en:
Merlita is 55 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Merlita is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other tools for farming.

Merlita has been farming rice for 10 years and earns additional income from pig fattening.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, which is to save enough money to buy more farmland.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other tools for farming.

loans.name: Jahongir

texts.ru: Чахонгир трудолюбивый и умный человек. Более 10 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур и животноводством. Начал свой бизнес с теленка и 50 соток земли. Со временем у него расширилось животноводство: теленок вырос , он приобрел еще одну корову и 2-х овец. Данный момент он планирует выращивание на 1,5 гектарах земли кукурузы, и умножить поголовье  крупнорогатого скота. Чахонгир запрашивает займ для покупки селитры для выращивания кукурузы.
texts.en:
Jahongir is a hardworking and smart man. He has been engaged in cultivation of crops and in livestock breeding for more than 10 years. He started his business with a calf and 50 acres of land. In time he has expanded the livestock breeding: The calf grew up, and he acquired an additional cow and two sheep. Currently he plans to grow corn on 1,5 hectares of land and multiply the cattle population. 

Jahongir asks for a loan for the purchase of nitrates for growing corn.

loans.use: to buy nitrate

loans.name: Umid

texts.ru: Умид женат и ответственный отец четверых детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 10 лет Умид занимается купле- продажей скота. У него довольно богатый опыт в бизнесе. Он хорошо знаком со спецификой  данного бизнеса. В бизнесе помогает жена. Умид запрашивает займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки скота с целью расширения оборотного капитала.
texts.en:
Umid is married and the responsible father of four children. His wife stays at home. Umid has been engaged in buying and reselling livestock for more than 10 years. He has a rather rich experience in the business. He is very familiar with the specifics of it. His wife helps him. 

Umid asks for a loan in the amount of 5 000 somoni for the purchase of cattle with an aim to increase the working capital.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Celia

texts.en:
Celia works hard to support her family. Celia is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Celia requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional fish to sell.

Celia has been in this business for seven years now.

In the future, Celia would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional fish to sell

loans.name: Abdusharob

texts.ru: Абдушароб женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек, который более 11 лет занимается купле- продажей скота. В обороте имеет 4 голов крупного рогатого скота. Имеет опыт в бизнесе и постоянно старается увеличивать поголовье скота. Хорошо знает специфику разведения крупного рогатого скота. Также занимается выращиванием и продажей лука. Абдушароб запрашивает займ для покупки скота и корма для них. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Abdusharob is married and is raising four children. He is a very hard working and honest man, who has been engaged in buying and reselling cattle for more than 11 years. He owns four heads of cattle. He has experience in the business and constantly tries to increase the total number of livestock. He knows the specifics of breeding cattle, and is also engaged in growing and selling leek. 

Abdusharob requests a loan for buying cattle and fodder for them. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle and feeds for them

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: Virginia es socia del Banco Comunal Lindo Amanecer, tiene 34 años, se dedica a la venta de leña y también hace bordados en tela y tejidos en lana, es madre de 3 niños y socia de Finca Perú desde hace 4 años, antes solo se dedicaba a la venta de leña pero ahora estando en Finca pudo aumentar su capital y así poder progresar y sacar adelante a sus hijos, valora mucho las enseñanzas que ha recibido en las capacitaciones de su Banco Comunal, porque le ayudan a ser mejor madre y negociante, gracias a los préstamos ella pudo comprarse su terreno, le encanta ahorrar, ahora esta pensando que hacer con sus ahorros. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de lana.
texts.en: Virginia, 34, is a member of the Lindo Amanacer (Beautiful Dawn) communal bank.  She sells firewood and also does embroidery on cloth and knits wool.  She is the mother of 3 and has been a member of Finca Perú for the past 4 years.  Before that she only sold firewood but now by being in Finca, she can increase her capital and thus progress and get her children ahead.  She values the training she has received from the communal bank because they have helped her be a better mother and businesswoman.  Thanks to the loans she was able to buy a piece of land.  She loves to save and is now thinking about what to do with her savings.  She will use the requested loan to buy wool.

loans.use: to buy wool

loans.name: Rosmery

texts.es: Rosmery es socia del Banco Comunal Lindo Amanecer, tiene 23 años, es madre de una linda bebe, se dedica a la venta de queso, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 2 años, gracias a las capacitaciones que recibe en su Banco Comunal pudo aprender a ahorrar, a ser mas responsable y a ser mas caritativa. Lo que desea o uno de sus sueños es construir su casa, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de queso.
texts.en:
Rosmery is a member of the Lindo Amanecer (Beautiful Dawn) community bank. She is 23 years old and mother to a beautiful baby. 

Rosemery sells cheese. She's been a member of FINCA Peru for two years. Thanks to the training the she gets from her community bank, she has learned how to save, to be more responsible, and to be more charitable. 

What she wishes for, or one of her dreams, is to build her house. Now she will invest her loan by purchasing cheese.

loans.use: to buy cheese.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Esther owns and operates a restaurant business. She and her husband have six children, and she works hard to support her family. She earns additional income from fish vending and raising livestock. 

Elena is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF in order to buy additional necessary ingredients for her restaurant business.

Elena has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additonal necessary ingredients for her restaurant business

loans.name: Marieta

texts.en:
Marieta, age 60, earns a living by by raising ducks and chickens. She has been engaged in this business for ten years and earns additional income from farming rice. She and her husband have six children.

She is borrowing PHP 12000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers for her field and feed for her ducks.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her field and feed for her ducks

loans.name: Emmanuel Wakoli

texts.en:
Emmanuel, age 34, runs a cafeteria to earn a living. He has been engaged in his business for eight years and has employed four people. To earn extra income, he farms maize. He and his wife have two children.

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, Emmanuel has been able to improve his business. He hopes to expand his business in the future. 

He has applied for a loan in the amount of 60,000 Kenya Shillings, which he will use to buy beans, rice, and cooking oil.

loans.use: to buy beans, rice, and cooking oil for his cafeteria business

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.en:
Beatriz has been engaged in a fishing business in Bayawan for the past eight years. She is married and works hard to support her family.
 
Beatriz has requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase fishing materials.

In the future, Beatriz would like to build and expand her business so as to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fishing materials

loans.name: Juanilita

texts.en:
Juanilita has a food vending business in Bayawan. In addition, she earns additional income from raising pigs. She and her husband have four children and she works hard to support her family.

Juanilita is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF in order to buy additional ingredients for her food vending business.

Juanilita has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, which is to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional essential ingredients for her food vending business

loans.name: Idrissa

texts.fr:
Monsieur Idrissa est un homme marié de 35 ans et père de 3 enfants, qui réside avec sa femme et ses enfants dans une famille traditionnelle élargie dans le quartier Massablacoura de Bougouni.
N’ayant pas fréquenté l’école moderne, très vite il s’intéressa aux activités génératrices de revenus.
Monsieur Idrissa fut d’abord apprentis chauffeurs dans l’espoir de devenir un jour chauffeur; cette activité ne lui est pas réussie. Il a également tenté les activités d’achat et de vente de chaussures et de tissus, mais sans réussite.
Alors il décide d’accompagner son oncle pour apprendre la vente de céréales. Avec une expérience de plus de 10 années, il maîtrise son activité.
Pour agrandir son entreprise, il décida de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso avec qui  il est à son huitième prêt et tous les prêts précédents ont été correctement remboursés.
Avec ce nouveau, Idrissa achètera, 1 tonne de maïs 2 tonnes de petit mil et 2 tonnes de riz. 
Il s’approvisionne à Bougouni et dans les villages  environnants pour ensuite les revendre soit à Bougouni ou à Bamako à une clientèle mixte.
La vente se fait au grand marché de Bougouni et une partie est vendue dans les différents villages les jours de marchés hebdomadaires.
Avec ce nouveau prêt il envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 70 000 FCFA, qui sera utilisé pour rembourser le prêt et subvenir aux dépenses de la famille.
texts.en:
Mr. Idrissa is 35 years old, married and the father of three. He lives with his wife and children in a traditional extended family in the Massablacoura of Bogouni. At first, Idrissa learned driving, in the hope of becoming a professional driver one day; this didn’t work out. He also tried selling shoes and cloth, but without success.

Then he decided to learn from his uncle how to sell cereals. Now, with over 10 years of experience, he excels at his work In order to expand his business, he decided to collaborate with Soro Yiriwaso. He is now on his eighth loan, and all prior loans have been well repaid. 
With this new loan, Idrissa will by one ton [2,205 lbs] of corn, two tons [4,409 lbs] of millet and two tons of rice.
He stocks up in Bougouni and in the nearby villages in order to resell later, either in Bougouni or in Bamako, to a diverse customer base. He sells at the big market of Bougoni and also sells a part of his stock at weekly markets in various villages. With this new loan, he plans to achieve a monthly income of 70,000 West African francs, which will be used to repay the loan and provide for family expenses.

loans.use: to buy cereals

loans.name: Nurali

texts.ru: Нурали два года как занимается скотоводством. Он в основном закупает скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Ему 44 года. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Он берет кредит для закупа овец.
texts.en: Nurali has been in the animal husbandry business for two years now. He mainly buys livestock for further resale. He is 44 years old, married and has four children. He is taking out this loan to buy sheep.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Monad

texts.ru: Монаджон молодая женщина, которая проживает в собственном доме, и имеет шесть баранов. Она кроме откорма скота занимается уходом за курами, и продаёт их яйца своим соседям. Монаджон нигде не работает, но ей хватает работы в своём хозяйстве. Она разведена и имеет одного ребёнка. На первый полученный кредит она купила корову и откормив её продала за хорошую цену и смогла купить новую параболическую антенну и холодильник. На следующий кредит она планирует купить несколько голов баранов, пока скот не подорожал на рынке.
texts.en: Monajon is a young woman who lives in her own house and has six sheep. Besides fattening of the livestock she also takes care of chickens and sells the eggs to her neighbors. Monajon doesn't work anywhere, but has enough work in her own business. She is divorced and has one child. She used the first loan to buy a cow and after fattening she sold it at a good price and was able to buy a new parabolic antenna and a refrigerator. She plans to use her next loan to buy several heads of sheep while the livestock is not very expensive on the market.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Ivan

texts.ru: Благодаря предыдущему кредиту Иван вложил средства в ферму и получил прибыль, на которую он рассчитывал.  Сделал ремонт в доме, улучшив жилищные условия. В этот раз Иван просит предоставить ему кредит, чтобы закупить семена, пленку, удобрения, а также отремонтировать теплицы. За счет прибыли Иван имеет возможность содержать свою семью, улучшать свой быт.
texts.en: Thanks to the previous loan Ivan invested the finances into his farm and received a profit which he was counting on. He made renovations at home and improved living conditions. This time Ivan is asking to provide him with a loan to buy seeds, film, fertilizer as well as to repair the greenhouse. Using the profit Ivan has an opportunity to support his family and improve his livelihood.

loans.use: to buy seeds, film, fertilizer, as well as repair the greenhouse.

loans.name: Getrud

texts.en: Getrud is a married woman. She has seven children and three of them are enrolled in school. Her husband's name is Richard and he works as a businessman. Getrud operates a retail shop and sells her goods in a shop. She's worked in this business for many years. Her primary customers are passersby. Getrud's other source of income includes farming. She describes her greatest business challenge to be the high cost of transportation and her highest monthly expense is food for the family. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Getrud will use the KES 50,000 loan to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and cooking fat oil. Getrud aspires to expand to a wholesale shop in the future. She joined Yehu to access funds to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and cooking fat oil.

loans.name: Pablo Alfredo

texts.es: El cliente se llama Pablo , tiene 28 años, es soltero, estudió Ingeniería Forestal en la Universidad pública  y actualmente vive en casa de su mamá en la zona de Aranjuez zona Norte. Una vez titulado trabajó en una empresa de la cual obtuvo experiencia lo cual incentivó a hacer la apertura de su propia consultora, asociándose con compañeros para alquilar un oficina en la ciudad y así tener menores costos, cada consultor de la oficina es independiente. Los principales servicios otorgados por la consultora son la elaboración de planes de manejo forestales para aserraderías que son cada dos veces al mes, certificados forestales de origen que son hechos de tres a cinco veces al mes, informe trimestral de las aserraderías, informe de extracción de plantaciones forestales (eucaliptos) que realiza tres veces mes, inspección para Cefo, conciliaciones y otros. El crédito que solicita es para mejorar la consultora con la compra de GPS, una computadora y muebles,  de esa manera contar con herramienta de trabajo de ultima tecnología que facilite el trabajo que realiza .
texts.en:
The borrower's name is Pablo. He is 28 years old, single, and studied forestry at the public university. Currently he lives in his mother's home in the area of Aranjuez towards the north. 

Once Pablo received his degree he worked in a firm where he gained experience; this motivated him to open his own consulting business. He partnered with other acquaintances to rent an office in the city and reduce the cost. Every consultant in the office is independent. 

The primary services offered by the consultant are the preparation of forest management plans for saw mills, which are twice per month; forestry certificates of origin, which are done three to five times a month; quarterly reports on the saw mills; reports on the harvesting of forest plantations (eucalyptus) that he does three times a month; inspections for CEFO (digital forest certificates), settlements, and others. 

The loan he's requesting is to improve his consulting business by purchasing GPS, a computer and furniture. This way he can count on the latest technological tools of the trade to help him with his work.

loans.use: to buy a computer, furniture, and GPS for the office.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
Nelly is 65 years old and widowed with one child.

Nelly works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell.

Nelly has borrowed and paid 16 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 25 years and also earns income from pig fattening.

Nelly aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes es socia del Banco Comunal Lindo Amanecer, tiene una tienda de licores y los trae de la Costa, ahora gracias a las oportunidades que le da Finca, con el préstamo podrá traer aceitunas, aceite de oliva y pasas, espera que el negocio le vaya muy bien como con los licores, esta muy agradecida a Finca Perú porque le ayudan siempre en el momento que mas lo necesita, agradece también las capitaciones que ha recibido, fue así que ella tomo la decisión de ampliar su negocio, todo lo que aprende en Finca lo transmite  a su familia.
texts.en: Mercedes is a member of the communal bank "Lindo Amanecer."  She has a liquor store, and she brings the liquor from the coast.  Now, thanks to the opportunity that FINCA is giving her, she will bring olives, olive oil and raisins.  She hopes that this business do as well as her liquor business.  She is very grateful to FINCA Peru, because they always help her at the time she needs it the most.  She also appreciates the training that she has received, because it was due to this training that she made the decision to expand her business.  She passes on everything she learns at FINCA to her family.

loans.use: to buy olives, olive oil and raisins

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 43 years old and married with two children who are in school, Susan works very hard to provide for them.

Susan runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Susan has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as sardines, spices, canned goods, etc. 

In the future, Susan would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase more stock to sell

loans.name: Oksana

texts.ru:
У Оксаны январь и февраль - обычно самые худшие месяцы в плане выручки. Эта зима была особенно плохой по торговле, из-за сильных морозов. Поэтому Оксана просит предоставить ей кредит, чтобы закупить 
искусственные цветы. Из них Оксана будет делать венки и корзины цветов на продажу.

Благодаря предыдущему кредиту Оксана отремонтировала свою квартиру, помогла дочери поступить учиться в Университет (оплатила учебу).

Муж Оксаны работает в Москве, на стройках, присылает деньги. У самой Оксаны уклад жизни простой: много работает, вкладывается полностью в торговле, а дома просто отдых вечером.
texts.en:
For Oksana January and February is usually the worst months in terms of profits. This winter was especially bad in sales because of the freezing temperatures. This is why Oksana is asking to give her a loan to buy artificial flowers. She will use them to make wreaths and baskets of flowers for sale.

Thanks to the previous loan Oksana remodeled her apartment and helped her daughter to enroll in the University (paid for her tuition).

Oksana's husband works in Moscow as a construction worker and sends her the money. Oksana has a simple way of life: she works a lot, giving all of herself to her business and then relaxes at home in the evenings.

loans.use: to buy artificial flowers.

loans.name: Roberta

texts.es: Roberta es socia del Banco Comunal Lindo Amanecer, tiene 74 años, ella tiene un tienda de abarrotes al interior de Ayacucho, A Roberta le hubiera gustado conocer mas antes a Finca y así trabajar como lo esta haciendo ahora, su hija la invitó a formar parte de su Banco Comunal y así pudo ser parte de esta gran familia.  Roberta ha aprendido mucho, ahora que vive sola ya que sus 5 hijos ya no están con ella, solo le queda seguir adelante, aprendió sobre la puntualidad, la responsabilidad en estos 2 años de ser socia. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de arroz, azúcar.
texts.en: Roberta is a member of the communal bank "Lindo Amanecer."  She is 74 years old, and she has a grocery store in Ayacucho.  Roberta would have liked to have known more before she joined FINCA, so that she could have worked the way she does now.  Her daughter invited her to join the communal bank, and so in this way she was able to become part of this great family.  Roberta has learned a lot.  Now that she lives alone, since her 5 children no longer live with her, she alone is left to carry on.  She has learned about the importance of punctuality and responsibility in the 2 years that she's been a member.  She will use the loan that she is requesting to buy rice and sugar.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice and sugar

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
Lilian is 52 years old, married and blessed with six children. She has been running a clothing business for the last 16 years and gets a monthly profit of KES 10,000. 

She has borrowed a loan of KES 30,000 and she will use the whole amount to purchase more stock of clothes to sell. She will use the anticipated profits to purchase a dairy cow for her family. This is her second loan from  KADET LTD and she paid the first loan successfully.

Her hopes and dreams are to expand her business, buy a plot and build rental houses and give the best education to her children.

loans.use: To purchase clothes to sell

loans.name: Halima

texts.en: Halima is taking out another Kiva loan of KES 100,000 to boost her clothes selling business. With the loan, she wants to purchase bundles of clothes for resale. Halima anticipates an increase in her monthly profits, which will enable her to establish real estate houses in the future. Thanks to Yehu and Kiva lenders for providing her an opportunity to improve her business.

loans.use: To purchase bundles of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Meredith

texts.en:
Meredith is 43 years old and has three children. Meredith is married. One of her children is in school.

Meredith is in the agricultural business raising livestock in the Philippines. Meredith requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Meredith has been in this business for 12 years and has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Meredith would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Helena Veronica

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade de Xai-Xai, Província de Gaza, Sul de Moçambique, casada e mãe de 6 filhos todos frequentam a Escola. Frequenta a 10ª classe, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.

Saiu de Xai-xai para Maputo afim de dar continuidade com os seus estudos e não conseguiu. É negociante há mais de 2 anos, dedica-se a venda de loiça e roupa usada, onde consegue um rendimento de cerca 4.000.00mt, mais 10.000.00mt do salário do seu marido, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).
Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu terceiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 25.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar produtos (panelas, pratos, talheres e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende ampliar a sua actividade comercial aumentando a quantidade da sua mercadoria, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
She was born in the town of Xai-Xai, province of the Gaza, southern Mozambique. She's married and has six children, all of which attend school. She attends 10th grade, lives with her family in a house she owns and does not support anyone else.
She left Xai-Xai for Maputo so that she could continue studying, but she didn't succeed. She has been a businesswoman for over two years. She sells tableware and used clothing and earns an income of about 4.000mt, plus 10.000mt from her husband's salary. She uses it to pay for home expenses and also saves part of it in her bank account.
She has never had loans in other banks. She first heard of Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is her third loan with Hluvuku. It is for 25.000mt, which she intends to use to purchase products (pots, plates, silverware, etc.) in order to increase the amount of her merchandise.
She pledges to make her repayments as scheduled. In the future, she intends to expand her business by increasing the amount of her merchandise. For that she plans to request more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to purchase pots, pans, and silverware for her store.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is 53 years old, married and a mother of four children. She has been selling charcoal in Mtopanga, Mombasa for the last five years with great success. 

This is her fifth loan from KADET LTD to finance her business. She plans to purchase more sacks of charcoal to resell to the residents of Mtopanga.

She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children and expand her business. She hopes to have a successful business and live a happier and comfortable life.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Kichangani Group

texts.en:
Upendo, who is in her late 20s, is married with two kids. One of her children goes to school and the other one is still young.  She has been running a grocery store for three yeas now. She works from 11:00 pm to 1:00 am (after mid-night) daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.  

This will be her 10th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to buy tables, chairs, a blender, a TV set, and a radio for her customers' entertainment. She also helped her husband with the household expenses. She has paid back all her loans successfully.  She wants a loan to open another grocery store in a different area.  Her dream is to be able to buy her own car.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Kichangani", which has 20 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: to open another grocery store in a different  area.

loans.name: Imboni/bgrm Group

texts.fr:
Alexis fait partie du groupe Imboni/Bgrm. Il a 35 ans et il est marié, avec 5 enfants de 1 an à 10 ans, dont 2 scolarises. Il a 1 personne dans son charge autre que ses enfants Son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de primaire.

Alexis est agriculteur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter, des fertilisants et payer la main d’œuvre.

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d’utilise des semences de race améliore. Dans les prochaines années, Alexis voudrait être un grand agriculteur dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit  de payer le frais scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Alexis is part of the group "Imboni/Bgrm". He is 35 years old and married, and he has five children from 1 to 10 years old. Two of the children are in school. He has one person to support aside from his children. He has a sixth grade education. 

Alexis is a rice farmer. This loan cycle is his first one with the microfinance institution ACB. He is going to use his loan to buy some fertilizer and to cover the cost of labor. 

His strategy for the growth of this business is to use improved types of seeds. In the next few years, Alexis would like to be a major farmer in his region. He plans on using the profits to pay the schooling costs for his children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to pay for labor

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es:
Jesús, vive en casa propia, junto a su esposa y 4 hijos que dependen de él, su ocupación es un taller de mecánica, en el cual atiende desde hace 7 años, inicio como mozo en otro lugar, luego fue obteniendo experiencia y se decidió por tener su propio taller.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de herramientas para la reparación de vehículos, llaves de diferentes medidas, mica, entre otras que son necesarias para realizar la revisión a los carros de los clientes, esto le permitirá estar preparado para atender las necesidades.
La aspiración de Jesús es tener un negocio con mejor capacidad, para tener mejores condiciones de responder a las necesidades familiares.
texts.en:
Jesús lives in his own house with his wife and four children, who depend on him. He has an auto repair shop, and has been in this business for seven years. He started off as a young boy in another place, then gradually gained experience and decided to have his own workshop. 

He is applying for a loan to buy tools for repairing vehicles, such as wrenches of different sizes, tail light covers, and other things needed to service customers' cars. This will allow him to be ready to meet the needs of his business.  

Jesús' ambition is to have a business with greater capacity, so that he will be better able to address his family needs.

loans.use: To buy tools for repairing vehicles.

loans.name: Carla

texts.es: Carla es socia del Banco Comunal Lindo Amanecer, tiene 30 años, su negocio es  una Cerrajería donde trabaja con su esposo, ella es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 2 años, le encanta la modalidad que tienen para poder hacer los préstamos, aprendió así sobre la responsabilidad, no solo en traer los pagos, sino también en poder entregar a tiempo los trabajos que realiza en la Cerrajería, agradece mucho toda la confianza que depositaron en ella. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de materiales para la cerrajería.
texts.en:
Carla is a member of the Lindo Amanecer (Beautiful Dawn) community bank. Her business is a locksmith's shop where she works with her husband. Carla has been a member of FINCA Peru for two years. She enjoys the way they're able to do loans. This is how she learned about responsibility, not only in making payments but also in finishing jobs for locksmith's shop on time. She really appreciates all the confidence they have in her. 

The loan she has requested will be used to buy materials for the locksmith's shop.

loans.use: to buy materials for a locksmith's shop.

loans.name: Fernando Elias

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Chibuto, Província de Gaza, Sul de Moçambique, casado e pai de 4 filhos destes o mais velho vai a Escola. Fez 5ª classe e não continuou devido a condições financeiras. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta seu irmão que vive com ele.

Saiu de Chibuto para Maputo no Distrito de Boane a procura de emprego, é serralheiro há mais de 10 anos, consegue um rendimento de cerca 5.000.00mt que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária.
Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de um amigo que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu quinto empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 18.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção da sua casa (ferro, cimento, areia, barrotes e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 6.000.00, 6.000.00, 12.000.00 e 15.000.00mt aplicados na habitação e comércio. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e mobilar, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
He was born in the district of Chibuto, province of Gaza, southern Mozambique. He's married and has four children, and the oldest one of them attends school. He completed 5th grade and didn't continue due to lack of financial conditions. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports his brother who lives with him.
He left Chibuto for Maputo in the district of Boane in search of a job. He has been a locksmith for over 10 years and earns an income of about 5.000mt. He uses it to pay for home expenses and also saves part of it in his bank account.
He has never had loans in other banks. He first heard of Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is his fifth loan with Hluvuku. It is for 18.000mt, which he intends to use to purchase construction supplies (iron, cement, sand, beams, etc.). The previous loans were for 6.000mt, 6.000mt, 12.000mt and 15.000mt and they were used for housing expenses and for his business.
He pledges to make his repayments as scheduled. In the future he intends to finish building and furnishing his home, and for that purpose he plans to request more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies for his house: iron, cement, sand, beams, etc.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos tiene 24 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en San josé de Chimbo provincia de Bolívar.

Juan es  profesor  se dedica a dar clases en una escuela. Solicita el crédito para comprar una motocicleta . La compra la realizara en la ciudad de Guaranda.

Con el apoyo del crédito podrá realizar la compra que tanto esperaba padrá transportarce en la moto al trabajo por lo que queda a 20 minutos de la casa.

El desafío seria luchar ante todo y salir adelante en caso de contraer alguna enfermedad.

El sueño es poder comprarse un vehículo. En el tiempo libre le gusta elaborar planes didácticos.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 24 years old and is single with no children.  He lives with his parents in San Jose de Chimbo in the province of Bolivar.  

Juan is a teacher who teaches in a school.  He is requesting a loan to buy a motorcycle.  He will make this purchase in the city of Guaranda.

With the support of the loan he will be able to make the purchase that he has been hoping for so much, so that he can travel to work which is located 20 minutes from his house.

The challenge will be to struggle against everything and to move forward in case he becomes ill.

The dream is to be able to buy a vehicle.  In his free time he likes to create teaching plans.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Sebastiao

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Boane, Província de Maputo, Sul de Moçambique, casado e pai de 2 filhos destes apenas o mais velho vai a Escola. Frequenta terceiro ano de ensino superior, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta ninguém.

É funcionário permanente do Ministério da Educação a 7 anos e trabalha como docente, onde tem um salário de 7.360.00mt que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).
Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de um colega que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu segundo empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 17.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção da sua casa (blocos, ferro, cimento, areia, barrotes e outros). O empréstimo anterior foi de 15.000.00mt aplicados na habitação. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
He was born in the district of Boane, province of Maputo, southern Mozambique. He's married and has two children, and only the oldest one of them attends school. He's in his third year of college. He lives with his family in a house he owns and does not support anyone else.
He has been a permanent official at the Ministry of Education for seven years. He works as a teacher and earns a salary of 7.360mt. He uses it to pay for home expenses and also saves part of it in his bank account.
He has never had loans in other banks. He first heard of Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is his second loan with Hluvuku. It is for 17.000mt, which he intends to use to purchase construction supplies for his house (bricks, iron, cement, sand, beams, etc.). The previous loan was for 15.000mt and it was used for housing expenses.
He pledges to make his repayments as scheduled. In the future he intends to finish building his home, and for that purpose he plans to request other loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to purchase bricks, iron, cement, sand, and beams for his home.

loans.name: Kalidou

texts.fr:
Monsieur  Kalidou est un vieux vendeur de moutons qui s’active depuis plus de 30 ans. Il adore son métier  car ses moutons sont comme ses enfants. 
Kalidou sollicite ce crédit pour acheter  des moutons  et augmenter son cheptel. 
Kalidou né en 1959, est marié et père de 4 enfants dont l’ainé est âgé  de 17 ans et le cadet 7 ans. En effet, c’est pour ses enfants et sa famille qu’il s’active toujours, pour  satisfaire leur besoins quotidiens malgré son âge.  
Comme la plupart des gens de cette race, son projet majeur est d’avoir  toujours davantage de bêtes à élever pour revendre.
texts.en:
Mr. Kalidou is an elderly seller of sheep who has been active for over thirty years. He loves his trade because his sheep are like his children. Kalidou is requesting this loan to buy some sheep and to increase his herd. 

Kalidou was born in 1959, and he is married and the father of four children. The oldest is 17 years old and the youngest is 7. Basically, Kalidou is active for the sake of his children and family, so as to support them day to day, despite his age. 

As with most people like him, his overall plan is to have still more animals to raise in order to resell.

loans.use: to buy sheep to resell at the local market

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, él se dedica a la reparación de automóviles, este negocio lo inicio por sus padres, quienes le apoyaron, no tiene un horario fijo para atender sus ocupaciones porque todo depende de la clientela.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de repuestos para vehículos,  con lo que pretende mejorar la atención para los clientes, manteniendo su preferencia, esto le ayudara tambien para garantizar trabajos y ganar dinero para la familia.
La aspiración de José es que el taller crezca con clientes, dándose a conocer, ya que esto le permitirá ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Jorge lives with his wife and two children. He repairs cars. He started this business for his parents sake, and they help him.  He doesn't have fixed work hours because everything depends on the customers.

He is applying for a loan to buy vehicle parts, with which he intends to improve service for his customers, and keep them coming back. This will also help him guarantee his jobs and earn money for his family.

José's ambition is to see his workshop acquire customers and become better known, as this will allow him to offer a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: To buy vehicle spare parts.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es: Vilma es socia del Banco Comunal San Benito, tiene 48 años, se dedica a la compra y venta de ganados, y también tiene una chacra donde siembra cereales, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 3 años, le encanta ahorrar, y las capacitaciones le ayudan a ser mas responsable, le encantó una de las capacitaciones en especial porque le ayudó a valorarse mas como mujer. Este préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de insecticida.
texts.en:
Vila is a member of the San Benito community bank. She is 48 years old and she buys and sells livestock. She also has small farm where she plants cereals. 

Vilma has been a member of FINCA Peru for three years. She enjoys saving and the training helps her to be more responsible; in particular she enjoyed one training because it helped her appreciate her value as a woman more. 

This loan will be invested in the purchase of insecticide.

loans.use: to buy insecticide.

loans.name: Silvia Mercedes

texts.es:
Silvia es socia del Banco Comunal San Benito, tiene 45 años, es madre de 4 niños, es dueña de un Restaurante, y también vende cerveza por mayor y menor, ella se siente muy bien en Finca Perú, porque aprende mucho de las capacitaciones, debido a que le ayudan a mejorar su negocio y la relación con su familia.
El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de bebidas para su negocio.
texts.en:
Silvia is a partner in the San Benito communal bank.  She is 45 years old and is the mother of 4 children.  She is the owner of a restaurant, and also sells beer wholesale and retail.  She feels very well in Finca Peru, because she is learning a lot from the training as they are helping her to improve her business and with her relationship with her family.  
She will invest the loan in the purchase of beverages for her business.

loans.use: buy drinks such as soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Laura

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Província de Tete, Centro de Moçambique, viúva e mãe de 5 filhos todos frequentam a Escola. Fez a 4ª classe parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos pais, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta ninguém.

Saiu de Tete para Maputo no distrito de Boane quando casou, é pensionista e antiga combatente, onde tem uma pensão de 5.600.00mt que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).
Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de um amigo que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu segundo empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 17.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção da sua casa (pedra, ferro, cimento, areia, barrotes e outros). O empréstimo anterior foi de 10.000.00mt aplicados na habitação. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e mobilar, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
She was born in the province of Tete, central Mozambique. She's a widow and has five children, all of which attend school. She completed 4th grade and stopped because her parents lacked financial conditions. She lives with her family in a house she owns and does not support anyone else.
She left Tete for Maputo, in the district of Boane, when she got married. She's a pensioner and a former combatant and she earns a pension of 5.600mt. She uses it to pay for home expenses and also saves part of it in her bank account.
She has never had loans in other banks. She first heard of Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is her second loan with Hluvuku. It is for 17.000mt, which she intends to use to purchase construction supplies for her house (stones, iron, cement, sand, beams, etc). The previous loan was for 10.000mt and it was used for housing expenses.
She pledges to make her repayments as scheduled. In the future, she intends to finish building and furnishing her home, and for that purpose she plans to request more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to purchase stones, cement, iron, sand, and beams to build her house.

loans.name: Guillermina Celena

texts.es:
Guillermina, vive con su familia, su esposo y dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de lubricantes para vehículos, este negocio lo inicio con el apoyo de su esposo, ya que él se dedica a la reparación de vehículos, aprovechando a los clientes que llegan para ofrecer sus productos, no tiene un horario establecido y si tiene ya experiencia en el negocio.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos lubricantes para la venta como por ejemplo aceite de frenos, esta compra le permitirá mejorar y abastecer el negocio, dándoles una buena atención a los clientes.
La aspiración de Guillermina es poder crecer junto a su esposo, ganar más clientes para mejorar su condición de vida.
texts.en:
Guillermina lives with her family, comprised of her husband and two children. She sells lubricants for vehicles. She started this business with her husband's help, as he repairs vehicles. She takes advantage of customer visits in order to sell her products. She has no fixed hours, and does already have business experience in the business.

She is applying for a loan to buy lubricants and similar products to sell, such as brake fluid. This purchase will allow her to improve and stock the business, and give the customers good service. Guillermina's ambition is to see both of their businesses grow and win more customers, in order to improve their standard of living.

loans.use: To buy vehicle lubricants.

loans.name: Leonor Azarias

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade da Matola, Província de Maputo, Sul de Moçambique, casada e mãe de 3 filhos todos frequentam a Escola. Fez a 7ª classe parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos pais, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta ninguém.

É operadora na empresa de produção de estencoes de cabelo Darling há mais de 5 anos, onde tem um salário de 4.300.00mt que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).
Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu segundo empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 15.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção da sua casa (cimento, pedra, ferro, areia, e outros). O empréstimo anterior foi de 10.000.00mt aplicado na habitação. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
She was born in the town of Matola, province of Maputo, southern Mozambique. She's married and three children, all of which attend school. She completed 7th grade and stopped because her parents lacked financial conditions. She lives with her family in a house she owns and does not support anyone else.
She has been an operator for a hair extensions production company named Darling for over five years. She earns a salary of 4.300mt. She uses it to pay for home expenses and also saves part of it in her bank account.
She has never had loans in other banks. She first heard of Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is her second loan with Hluvuku. It is for 15.000mt, which she intends to use to purchase construction supplies for her house (cement, rocks, iron, sand, etc). The previous loan was for 10.000mt and it was used for housing expenses.
She pledges to make her repayments as scheduled. In the future she intends to finish building her home, and for that purpose she plans to request more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to purchase cement, rocks, iron, sand, etc. in order to build her home.

loans.name: Gertrudes Norda

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade da Maputo, Província de mesmo nome, Sul de Moçambique, solteira e mãe de 3 filhos todos frequentam a Escola. Fez a 5ª classe parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos pais, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta ninguém.

É empacotadora na Bananalândia há mais de 11 anos, onde tem um salário de 4.900.00mt que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).
Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu segundo empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 15.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção da sua casa (portas, janelas, cimento, areia, e outros). O empréstimo anterior foi de 15.000.00mt aplicado na habitação. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
She was born in the town of Maputo, province of the same name, southern Mozambique. She's single and has three children, all of which attend school. She completed 5th grade and stopped because her parents lacked financial conditions. She lives with her family in a house she owns and does not support anyone else.
She has been a packer for the Bananalândia company for over 11 years. She earns a salary of 4.900mt. She uses it to pay for home expenses and also saves part of it in her bank account.
She has never had loans in other banks. She first heard of Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is her second loan with Hluvuku. It is for 15.000mt, which she intends to use to purchase construction supplies for her house (doors, windows, cement, sand, etc). The previous loan was for 15.000mt and it was used for housing expenses.
She pledges to make her repayments as scheduled. In the future she intends to finish building her home, and for that purpose she plans to request more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies for her house: windows, cement, sand, etc.

loans.name: Felicisima

texts.en:
Felicisima is a 47-year-old married woman with 2 children aged 14 and 16. She and her husband are both farmers.

Felicisima has been growing and selling rice for 20 years. She earns about 3000 PHP per month by farming. Felicisima works hard to support her husband in providing for their needs and sending their kids to school. She requested a loan to purchase fertilizers and pay for labor. Felicisima is hoping to achieve an abundant harvest.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pay for labor.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es: Gregoria de 45 años de edad vive en la ciudad de Cartagena, con su cónyuge y su pequeño hijos de 1 año de edad. Allí tiene un negocio mediante el cual ofrece servicios de peluquería a su clientela ubicado en su propia casa en el macroproyecto de vivienda sostenible, liderado por la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y del cual es beneficiaria. Ella empezó su experiencia trabajando a domicilio, pero siempre con la meta de instalarse en un local para ofrecer de manera más confortable sus servicios de mejoramiento de la imagen personal. En su negocio le esta yendo muy bien pero quiere aprovechar su clientela para venderle también otros productos capilares y mercancías como  calzado sabanas y variedades. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, segundo financiamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual  diversificará sus líneas de trabajo. Su inversión planea tener éxito porque la hace teniendo como base un mercado potencial que es el del macroproyecto que se encuentra en crecimiento y donde busca posicionarse porque no tiene una importante competencia.  Su mayor desafío es capitalizar su negocio y eso ella, muy seguramente,  lo conseguirá poco a poco, con su decisión de crecimiento y un persistente trabajo, disciplinado y ordenado.
texts.en:
Gregoria is 45 and lives in the city of Cartagena with her partner and small one-year-old son. She has a hairdressing business located in her own home in the Sustainable Housing Macroproject spearheaded by Fundación Mario Domingo, of which she is a beneficiary. She gained her initial experience working at home, but always with the goal of setting herself up in a shop, in order to offer her personal makeover services in a more comfortable way.

Her business is going very well, but she wants to make the most of her clientele to also sell them hair products, and merchandise such as shoes, sheets, and other items. This is the reason she is approaching her credikiva institution for her second loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use it to diversify her lines of work. 

Her investment is designed to succeed, as it is based on the potential market represented by the growing Macroproject development. She is seeking to position herself there, because she does not have significant competition. Her greatest challenge is obtaining working capital for her business, and she will surely get it, little by little, through her decision to expand, her perseverance, and her disciplined, well-organized way of working.

loans.use: To buy hair products and merchandise such as shoes, sheets and other items.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
La señora Victoria es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazones Unidos”, del distrito de Desaguadero, provincia de Chucuito y departamento de Puno, tiene 58 años de edad, está casada y tiene tres hijos independientes.  La Sra. realizo estudios de educación primaria incompleto.
Trabaja desde hace siete años con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que invirtió en su negocio de venta de golosinas, galletas, gaseosas y frutas, paralelamente se dedica a la venta de animales, negocio principal que le genera mayores ingresos.
Solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de  S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles dinero que invertirá en la compra de una vaca,  también algunas golosinas para su negocio.  La señora vende sola las golosinas y frutas, con los animales le ayuda su esposo.
Su sueño para el futuro es mejorar el negocio y cambiar a otro giro que le permita generar más ganancias.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las reuniones, la puntualidad y la responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Sra. Victoria is a member of the Communal Bank "Corazones Unidos" (United Hearts) which is in the District of Desaguadero in Chucuito Province, Department of Puno. She is 58 years old, married, and has three children who are independent. Victoria attended elementary school, but she did not finish.

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for seven years. Her first loan was in the amount of 300 PEN and invested in her business of selling candy, cookies, sodas, and fruit. At the same time, she sells animals and this is the main business that generates most of her income.

Victoria is requesting a new loan in the amount of 1000 PEN to invest in the purchase of a cow. She will also buy some candy for her other business. Victoria sells candy and fruit by herself, but when selling the animals, she has the help of her husband. Her dream for the future is to improve her business and then switch to another field that will generate more income. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the meetings, the punctuality, and the responsibility.

loans.use: to buy a cow and some candy.

loans.name: Green Group

texts.en:
Fatuma, who is in her early 20s, is married with one child who goes to school.  She has been a food vendor for one year now.  She works from 8.00 am to 6.00 pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit. 

This will be Fatuma's 5th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to restock the missing items in her food store. She wants a loan to increase the stock of food. Her dream is to one day be able to build her own house.

Fatuma will share this loan with her loan group "Green" which has a total of 15 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: to increase the stock of food.

loans.name: Celso

texts.es:
Celso es un padre de familia de 41 años de edad que vive junto a su esposa y a sus hijos en el distrito de Mórrope, una zona rural de la provincia de Lambayeque, ubicada a 45 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la comercialización de animales en un mercado en la ciudad de Chiclayo. Él visita caseríos cercanos para comprar ovejas y chivos, los cuales engorda para luego venderlos a los negociantes que visitan la zona. Este negocio le brinda los ingresos que necesita para salir adelante y sostener la economía de su familia, por lo que trata siempre de mantenerlo con mucho esfuerzo.

Celso desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más animales para criarlos y venderlos. Siguiendo este objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2,500 nuevos soles.

Celso es un padre de familia bastante entregado a su trabajo y que siempre vela por el bienestar de los suyos.
texts.en:
Celso is a 41-year-old father who lives with his wife and children in the District of Mórrope, a rural area in in Lambayeque Province. This community is located 45 minutes away from the city of Chiclayo.

Celso sells animals at a market in the city of Chiclayo. He visits nearby villages to buy sheep and goats for fattening and later sells them to the traders who visit the area. This business provides the income he needs to move forward and sustain his family's finances. For this reason, he always tries to maintain his business with great effort.

Celso wants to expand his business by purchasing more animals to raise and sell. In order to proceed with this goal, he decided to request his first loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2,500 PEN. Celso is a father who is concerned about his work since he always looks after the welfare of his family.

loans.use: to buy animals for eventual resale.

loans.name: Duo Los Encantos Group

texts.es: Duo los Encantos, doña Catarina 31 años de edad se dedica a la elavoracion de sueteres y a la venta de maiz gracias a Dios a Prosperado en su negocio y ha ido creciendo poco a poco nececita este credito para la compra de materia prima  y poder amppliar mas su negocio ya que su deseo es tener una venta mas grande y estar ya que ultimamente los productos esta bastante caros, espera que le puedan apoyar en este credito al igual que la siguiente socia se dedica a la elavoracion de tejidos tipicos.
texts.en:
Duo Los Encantos ("The Delights" Duo)

Doña Catarina is 31 years old and earns her living by making sweaters and selling corn. Thanks to God, she has prospered in her businesses since they have grown a little bit at a time. She needs this loan to buy raw materials so that she can expand her businesses even more. Her wish is to have a larger shop. Lately her supplies have been quite expensive, so she hopes that the help from this loan will enable her to continue making traditional woven products.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for making sweaters and to purchase corn.

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en: Eunice is a 31-year-old married woman. She has 4 children between the ages of 5 months and 13 years and 3 are enrolled in school. Her husband works as a businessman. Eunice operates a charcoal selling business and sells her goods door to door. She's worked in this business for 2 years and was previously a farmer. Her primary customers are neighbors. Eunice's other source of income is from selling her farm. She describes her greatest business challenge to be high cost of transportation and her highest monthly expenses is food and school fees. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Eunice will use the Kes 40,000 loan to purchase sacks of charcoal. Eunice aspires to expand her business in the future. She joined Yehu to access funds.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Mohamad Joumaa

texts.en:
Mohamad Joumaa is a 35-year-old married man, father of three children, who has been working in home products sales for twenty years.
In 2000, Mohamad Joumaa opened his present shop, and since then has been expanding it gradually.
He is a hardworking man, who seeks perfection in his business, especially through responding to almost all of his customers needs.
He has excellent customer service which he believes is the main source of improvement of his business.
Mohamad Joumaa is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, in order to increase his merchandise with special household products with special prices.
This is his second cycle as an Al Majmoua borrower. His previous loan helped a lot in improving his business. At the same time, he is a borrower in good standing. He hopes he can open new branches in the future.

loans.use: To increase his merchandise with special household products with special prices

loans.name: Chub

texts.en:
Chub is 55 years old and blessed with two children. She lives with her family in a village of Ornlong Veng district and generates her income through rice and potatoes production and sales. She is able to earn a suitable income each day through this type of business. She aims to earn more income to provide sufficiently for her family's necessities, especially for her children’s education.

At present, she has cultivated land, and then she will plant her rice in the coming season. However, due to the lack of adequate capital, she would like to acquire some funds from HKL to pay for a plowing fee. She believes that the loan will help her increase her earning.

loans.use: to pay for a plowing fee.

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en: Eunice is a businesswoman who is married with one child. She makes bead necklaces to earn a living. She has been in the business for 7 years and has employed one person. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to improve her living standards and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy beads, wires, and threads.

loans.use: To buy beads, wires, and threads

loans.name: Yinarbubu

texts.ru: Ынарбубу 54 года, вдова, имеет 3 детей. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Ынарбубу занимается животноводством.  Начатое в 1991 году с 1,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  на сегодня приносит около 8,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. Благодаря упорному труду Ынарбубу, ее поголовье насчитывает 3 коровы и 10 овец. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Ынарбубу обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы Ынарбубу планирует вложить в реконструкцию дома, а в дальнейшем - в увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Yinarbubu is 54 years old, a widow and has three children. Yinarbubu does animal husbandry as a source of income for her family. She started her business in 1991 with 1,000 som (KGS) which now brings her around 8,000 som a month from the sale of milk and dairy products. Thanks to her hard work at this time Yinarbubu's livestock headcount has three cows and ten sheep. With the goal to further develop her business Yinarbubu has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 100,000 KGS to buy livestock. She plans to invest the profit from the loan in reconstruction of her house and in the future to increase of the headcount of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Hermelinda

texts.es:
La señora es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazones Unidos”, del distrito de Desaguadero, provincia de Chucuito y departamento de Puno, tiene 35 años de edad, es soltera y tiene dos hijos en edad escolar, la señora  estudió educación superior.
La señora trabaja desde hace 2 ciclos con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que invirtió en su negocio de venta de plastiqueria en general.
Ahora solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de  S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles dinero que utilizará para comprar 20 farros de utensilios de plásticos, para luego venderlos.  La señora compra la mercadería de la ciudad de Arequipa.
Su sueño para el futuro es terminar de construir su casa y abrir una tienda de plastiqueria.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la orientación que brinda la Promotora y la ganancia del ahorro.
texts.en:
This woman is a member of the Communal Bank "Corazones Unidos" (United Hearts) which is in the District of Desaguadero in Chucuito Province, Department of Puno. She is 35 years old, single, and has two children who are of school age. She received her higher education.

This woman has worked with Manuela Ramos for two loan cycles. Her first loan was in the amount of 500 PEN and invested in her business of selling plastic goods. Now she is requesting a new loan in the amount of 1000 PEN so that she can buy 20 cases of plastic utensils for eventual resale. She buys her merchandise in the city of Arequipa.

Her dream for the future is to finish the construction of her house and to open a plastic goods store. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the orientation sessions conducted by the promoter and the earnings from her savings.

loans.use: to buy 20 cases of plastic utensils.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is 52 years old. He runs a retail shop as his primary business and a cereals store as his secondary business. Robert is married and a father of six children. He has been in these business for three years and generates a monthly income of KES. 15,000. Robert has taken out a loan of KES. 50,000. He will be using the loan to add more stock of maize and beans for sale. The anticipated profits will be used to expand the business and meet his family's financial needs.
 
This is his third loan from KADET LTD, after successfully repaying the previous ones. His hopes and dreams are to be stable financially.

loans.use: to add more stock of maize and beans for sale.

loans.name: Ruth Cecilia

texts.es:
La Señorita. Ruth es socia del banco comunal Señoras de Taguan, viven por los alrededores de una parroquia perteneciente al cantón Sigsig, lugar que tiene una exuberante vegetación y muchos lugares  para visitar, su gente se dedica a la cría de animales, agricultura y también laboran en las artesanías en especial fabricando sombreros de paja toquilla.
 
La Señorita  Ruth tiene 18 años de edad, es soltera y vive con su madre quien tiene un bar, la casa en la que vive es de propiedad de su madre.
 
Ella trabaja en una fábrica de ropa, esta actividad la desempeña hace 7 meses y de lunes a viernes.

Este es su primer crédito en la banca comunal a la cual fue invitada por su mamá. Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y alimento para los mismos ya que va a poner un criadero de pollos.

Su meta es seguir los estudios Universitarios.
texts.en:
Srta. Ruth is a member of the Communal Bank "Señoras de Taguan" (Ladies of Taguan). The members live on the outskirts of a parish in the canton of Sigsig. This place has lush vegetation and many sites to visit. The people raise animals, engage in agriculture, and also produce handicrafts, especially the manufacture of Panama hats.

Srta. Ruth is 18 years old, single, and lives with her mother who manages a bar. Her mother owns the house in which they live. Ruth works at a clothing factory Monday through Friday. She has been in this job for seven months.

This is her first loan with the Communal Bank after being invited to join by her mother. Her loan will be invested in the purchase of chickens and poultry feed since she plans to raise these birds. Her goal is to continue her university studies.

loans.use: to buy chickens and poultry feed.

loans.name: Diokoura Dite Batoma

texts.fr:
Madame Diokoura dite Batoma est une femme mariée de 22 ans et mère d’un enfant. Elle réside avec son époux et son enfant dans le quartier Massablacoura de Bougouni.
N’ayant pas fréquentée l’école, dès son jeune âge, elle commença les activités génératrices de revenus. 
Après  avoir mené  plusieurs activités notamment la vente de chaussures et cela sans réussite, elle décida de s’intéresser à la vente de produits alimentaires tels les légumes, les tubercules et les noix de coco, apprise de sa mère.
Nantie d’une expérience de 5 ans, elle maîtrise bien son activité. 
Afin de satisfaire sa clientèle en nette croissance, elle décide de rejoindre le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso avec qui elle est à son premier. 
Elle compte utiliser ce prêt pour acheter 500 kg d’ignames et deux paniers de bananes plantains. 
Elle s’approvisionne à Bougouni et à Sikasso pour les revendre au grand marché de Bougouni et dans les villages environnants les jours de foires hebdomadaires à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes.
Avec ce prêt elle espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 65 000FCFA qui servira essentiellement utilisé pour agrandir davantage son entreprise.
texts.en:
Diokoura Dite Batoma is 22 years old, married, and the mother of one child.  She lives with her husband and child in the Massablacoura neighborhood of Bougouni.

Diokoura Dite Batoma never attended school but became involved in income-generating activities at a very young age.
After trying several activities, such as selling shoes, without much success, she decided to move on to selling food products (vegetables, tubers and coconuts), a trade she learned from her mother.  She now has a 5-year experience in this field and manages her business well.  

In order to meet the needs of a rapidly increasing number of customers, she has decided to join Soro Yiriwaso and has requested her first loan.  With this loan, she is planning to buy 500kg of yams and two baskets of plantains.

She stocks up in Bougouni and Sikasso and resells at the Grand Market in Bougouni, as well as in surrounding villages on weekly market days.  Her customers are men and women.

With this loan, she is expecting monthly profits to reach 65,000 CFA francs which will be essentially used to further expand her business.

loans.use: to buy food products.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
La señora Paulina es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazones Unidos”, del distrito de Desaguadero, provincia Chucuito y departamento de Puno, tiene 45 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos (1 independientes), ella estudió educación primaria incompleta.
Desde hace dos ciclos trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio venta de chifleria.
Solicitará un nuevo crédito  por la suma de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles con el cual podrá comprar  20 paquetes de serpentina, mistura, espumas, para vender en las fiestas de carnavales, trabaja sola en el negocio.
Su sueño para el futuro es tener capital propio para mejorar el negocio.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo y las reuniones porque es una distracción.
texts.en:
Sra. Paulina is a member of the Communal Bank "Corazones Unidos" (United Hearts) which is in the District of Desaguadero in Chucuito Province, Department of Puno. She is 45 years old, married, and has four children (one of whom is independent). Paulina attended elementary school, but she did not finish.

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for two loan cycles. Her first loan was in the amount of 500 PEN and the money was invested in her business of selling knickknacks. Paulina is requesting a new loan in the amount of 1000 PEN in order to buy 20 packets of streamers, confetti, and foam to sell for the Carnival festivities. She works alone in her business.

Her dream for the future is to have operating capital to improve her business. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the convenience of the loan and the group meetings because they provide a distraction.

loans.use: to buy 20 packets of streamers, confetti, foam, and other supplies.

loans.name: Dieynaba

texts.fr:
Madame  Dieynaba, âgée de39 ans, s’active dans le commerce depuis 3 ans. Son activité consiste à vendre des œufs.
Dieynaba, divorcée est mère de 4 enfants n’a pas de charges car ses enfants sont entretenus par leur père. Le plus âgé a 20 ans et le plus jeune, 13.
Avec le crédit, elle va acheter 100 tablettes d’œufs et stocker. Elle a comme projet futur l’ouverture d’une boutique.
texts.en:
Dieynaba is 39 years old and has been actively involved in retail business for three years.  She is an egg seller.
Dieynaba is divorced and the mother of four children.  However, since her children are under the care of their father, she has no expenses.  Her oldest child is 20 years old, the youngest is 13.
With her loan, she will buy 100 egg trays and increase her stock.  Her ambition is to open a shop.

loans.use: to buy eggs for resale.

loans.name: Walter Fernando

texts.es:
Walter Fernando tiene 27 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos vive con los padres en San Jose de Chimbo Provincia de bolívar.

Walter se dedica al arreglo de motos, es mecánico. Solicita el crédito para comprarse una moto y poder trabajar de mensajero para tener otro ingreso.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejorar la calidad de vida. La compra lo hará en San Miguel de Bolívar.

El desafío al que se presenta es la competencia que a diario se presenta. El sueño e poder tener un taller propio, e incrementar los ingresos. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar boly.
texts.en:
Walter Fernando is 27 yeas old, single and has no children, he lives with his parents in San Jose de Chimbo, province of Bolívar.

Walter fixes motorcycles, he is a mechanic. He needs the loan to buy a motorcycle to work as a messenger and have another source of income.

With the loan’s aid he will be able to improve his quality of life. He will buy the motorcycle in San Miguel de Bolívar.

A challenge that he faces is daily competition. Walter’s dream is to have his own workshop and to increase his earnings. In his free time he enjoys playing volleyball.

loans.use: buy a motorcycle to work as a messenger and have another source of income.

loans.name: Los Ficus Group

texts.es:
El Grupo Ficus esta integrado por once mujeres muy trabajadoras y emprendedoras las cuales trabajan para ayudar a sus esposos a sacar adelante a sus familias.

La señora Yolanda es uno de los integrantes de este grupo, ella tiene la edad de 35 años, solo estudio hasta la primaria y esta casada con el señor Enrique que trabaja como musico y obrero, ellos tienen dos hijos Lupita es la mayor estudia la primaria y Enrique que aun es pequeño y no estudia. Doña Yolanda nos platica que desde hace un poco mas de 5 años con el apoyo de su esposo construyeron un pequeño local junto a su casa e inicio a vender dulces y refrescos con los niños de su colonia con el propósito de ganar un poco de dinero extra y asi dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia su negocio poco a poco ha estado progresando y los fines de semana vende rebanadas de pizza y chicharrones preparados, su negocio ha ganado muca popularidad y todos los hijos de los vecinos acuden hacerle el gasto y se dice que tiene muy buen sazon.

Ella invertirá este crédito en la compra de variedad de dulces(paletas, chicles, gomitas, dulces de menta, chocolates) para resurtir su negocio.

Ella desea que con esta inversión su negocio continué progresando y así poder dar una mejor calidad de vida a sus familia.

Los demas integrantes del grupo son:

Patricia venta de antojitos 
Elizabet venta de cosmeticos 
Maria venta de cosmeticos 
Carolina venta de cosmeticos
Laura Venta de abarrotes
Yolanda (otra Yolanda) cultivo de caña 
Ana venta de cosmeticos 
Maria Teresa venta de cosmeticos 
Rosa Venta de calzado 
Honoria venta de cosmeticos
texts.en:
The Ficus group is made up of eleven very hard working and enterprising women, who work to help their husbands and to give their families a good start in life.

Mrs. Yolanda is one of the members of this group; she is 35 years old and only has a primary school education. She is married to Mr. Enrique who works as a musician and mason. They have two children, Lupita is the oldest and is in primary school and Enrique is still a baby and is not in school. Mrs. Yolanda tells us that with her husband's help they built a small room in their home where they sell candy and refreshments to the children in the neighborhood; it took them some 5 years to complete it. They did this to have extra income and provide their family with a better quality of life. The business has been improving little by little and during the weekends she sells pizza slices and fried crackling prepared in the home. The business is well known and all of the neighborhood children go to the store and spend since they say they have a delicious zest.

Mrs. Yolanda will use the loan to buy a variety of candy (ice cream, gum, jelly candy, mints, and chocolates)
